summary: This add-on presents an independent story set in the district town of Wellington Wells. His plot revolves around a rockman and the infamous heartbreaker Nick Lightbearer. Is the artist really the one for whom he publicly claims to be?

name: Wedding Designer
summary: Agency simulator that deals with organizing weddings in unusual locations. Some look for fashionable places, others originality. This is where imagination counts. Our agency can organize a wedding party in such extraordinary places as an old farm, a junkyard, an abandoned factory, a fishing port or a funfair.

name: Wetpants
summary: Wetpants is a short VR archery experience. Get your bow and bombs and guard that fortress to the last man and...tree?

name: Welcome to the Dark Place
summary: An exploration through a cryptic and dangerous world where everything and nothing has a meaning. We all go to the Dark Place.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake
summary:
An idyllic town nestled in the Rocky Mountains, Primrose Lake is not as quaint as it seems. When Jenny Carlyle hitches a ride from a total stranger, she quickly realizes something is seriously wrong. No cell reception. No internet. Nothing to do but bide her time and try to stay out of trouble. It isn't easy to do. In Primrose Lake, trouble has a way of catching up to you.

Experience a new Time Management mystery where everyone has a secret, and there's no place to hide from the past.

name: We Stay Behind
summary: We Stay Behind is an interactive mystery short story about repressed trauma and buried secrets. As players guide the protagonist through an intriguing tale of personal discovery, their choices will literally transform Laura's world.

name: Westworld Awakening
summary: "Westworld Awakening" is a narrative-driven experience played from the perspective of Kate - a host who has attained self-awareness. To survive a dangerous underworld where no one and nothing is what it seems, you must overcome an entire world designed to destroy and enslave you.

name: Wetten Dass..?
summary: Wetten Dass..? is based on the German TV game show of the same name. The game can be played by up to four players. The player who gets most of the bets right earns the highest score and thus wins the game.

name: Weeping Willow
summary: Weeping Willow is a kinetic visual novel in the genre of detective. Events take place in the small town of Weidendorf during quarantine of the plague.

name: Welcome to Quiet Haven
summary: The second and final demo for the upcoming open world horror game!

name: Wer Weiß Denn Sowas?: Das 2. Spiel
summary: It's time for round two, promising the best entertainment for you and your friends. Play in a team with Elton or compete alongside of Bernhard Hoëcker. You'll have to give your all in "Wer weiß denn sowas?" 30 new shows await you with exciting questions and answer videos.

name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN 2 : Master Tormenter Grendel Jinx !?
summary: Set sometime during the protagonist's holiday, who wants nothing more than a quiet day alone. Grendel Jinx has other plans for the protagonist and will stop at nothing to get an answer to an important question. Will either of them get what they want ?

name: Weird and Unfortunate Things Are Happening
summary: Explore what's left of the ravaged city and find your way through surreal otherworldly areas that connect the broken urban shell. Encounter any other citizens who have survived and make contact with the strange entities that now inhabit this realm. Survive. Or be swallowed up by the city and forgotten forever.

name: West of Dead
summary: Step into the boots of the dead man William Mason and descend into the grim and gritty world of Purgatory in this fast-paced twin-stick shooter that'll put your skills to test. Dodge behind cover as you try to outgun your enemies in the unknown procedurally generated hunting grounds. The Wild West has never been this dark.

name: We Happy Few: We All Fall Down
summary: Play as Victoria Byng, get a grip on her whip, and get the last word on the story of Wellington Wells. As Victoria reckons with her own withdrawals, the city slides deeper into Joy shortage and disorder. It's always been Victoria's duty to help keep things proper, but the closer she looks, the deeper the rot seems to run.

name: West-Ward
summary: A wonderful world of whit and whimsy. Plant your feet firm, it gets awfully windy.

name: West Sweety
summary: Welcome to the bar in the wild west, in this game, you roled a cowboy, use bullets & the wisdom of luck to conquer the beauty...

name: Webmaster - Fantastic Adventures in the World of the Internet
Weird West
summary: Discover a dark fantasy reimagining of the Wild West where lawmen and gunslingers share the frontier with fantastical creatures. Journey through the origin stories of a group of atypical heroes, written into legend by the decisions you make in an unforgiving land. Each journey is unique and tailored to the actions taken - a series of high stakes stories where everything counts and the world reacts to the choices you make. Form a posse or venture forth alone into an otherworldly confines of the Weird West and make each legend your own.

name: Web Spice Purple World
summary: The planet's been attacked again, you're using memes again, winning and all that, yay. Become a master in the fight against evil, use all your Arsenal, and show that your home planet is worth it to protect it.

name: We Who Are About to Die
summary: Take control of a brand new randomized gladiator with a single life, fight your way from pit to arena to stadium, pleasing larger and larger crowds until you finally become a legend of the Grand Stadium... or gloriously die trying!

name: Westminster Darkly
summary: A turn-based strategy RPG set in modern time Westminster (UK), after a massive solar storm causes the end of the electric age.

name: Weed Farmer Simulator
summary: Become a weed farmer! You just moved out of the city and bought land for growing some weed. It might not look like much right now but only your imagination is the limit!

name: Weird-Egg and Crushing Finger
summary: Control a giant finger. Decide the fate of a people.

name: Weird War - The Unknown Episode of World War II
summary:
Weird War is a classic RPG with loads of action and is set during the Second World War. It's a game brimming with adventures and humor but also with many battles.
The game combines an atmosphere of adventure like that found in "Raiders of the Lost Ark" with a unique brand of humor made popular by the "Allo, Allo" Television series, creating a refreshing and lighthearted perspective of World War II.

Weird War - the Unknown Episode of World War II, is similar to classic RPGs such as Baldur's Gate, Arcanum and Planescape Torment. This familiar style will allow RPG fans to feel right at home, allowing them to enjoy an original storyline in a classic gaming environment.

Graphically, Weird War resembles a classic RPG's. The world is depicted in an isometric view that is centers on you as you move throughout the environment. An intuitive icon-based interface allows you to issue team commands for movement, combat, inventory management and character statistics.

Combat occurs often in Weird War and takes place in real time. During the course of each battle, you can pause the game, which freezes combat, but still allows you to issue commands and access each character's inventory.

name: Werewolves 2: Pack Mentality
summary: Continue your story in the exciting sequel to Werewolves: Haven Rising. The werewolf species depends on you in a dramatic fight for survival!

name: Weed County
summary: Grow, package, and sell weed while managing personal needs and furnishing your own home. Make friends with the community of Weed County by day and make drug deals at night. Buy properties and businesses to launder dirty money and pay off the debt hanging over your head.

name: We Went Back
summary: We Went Back is a sci-fi time-looping horror game located on an abandoned lunar station. Explore, deduce, and unleash terror in order to find a way out.

name: Werewolf Voice: Best Board Game
summary: Are you ready for some accusations, lying, bluffing, interactive, brainstorming, and assassination? Use your voice to convince people to believe in you. Fun games to play with friends and meet other players in the world!

name: Welcome Nakayoshi Park
summary: "Welcome Nakayoshi Park" is a video game released for Nintendo Game Boy by Bandai in 1994.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2: Part III - NightFall
summary: Spanning five years, this episode concludes the prequel arc, and focuses more on Grendel Jinx and her dysfunctional family, whilst 'The Council Of The Unseen' slowly unravels

name: Westmark Manor
summary: What lurks in the darkest corners of the mansion? Westmark Manor is a journey into the occult, a mind-bending survival horror game, with a heavy focus on solving puzzles and exploration, inspired by the formidable H.P. Lovecraft.

name: Welcome to Elk
summary: Welcome to Elk is a biographical adventure set on an island like no other, where every character you encounter has a story to tell. From the weird and wonderful to the dark and desperate, all the tales told on Elk are based on true stories of life on the road less traveled.

name: Welcome To... Chicheser OVN 3 : The Mysterious Affair At The Violet Hotel
Welcome To Chichester OVN 3: The Mysterious Affair at the Violet Hotel
summary: When a guest at The Violet Hotel is found dead, Grendel Jinx and her "friend" are forced to investigate the death - or else pay for repairs caused by a microwave oven accident.

name: Western Sigil
summary: Western Sigil is a tower defense & resource management game with a dose of strategy, where you control units of unlikely allies. Shoot your way through the hordes of creatures and save Weird West from the spreading plague!

name: We should talk.
summary:
It's not what you say, it's how you say it. We should talk is a short-form narrative game that will make players think carefully about the words they choose.

Using a unique narrative choice mechanic, players craft sentences in response to the in-game characters in We should talk. Through this careful choice of words, players express themselves as they discuss ongoing problems about life and romance with their in-game partner over text messages, while also chatting with friends and strangers at their favorite local bar about what's on their mind.

The combination of words they choose impacts the conversations they have, how genuinely they can connect with their partner, and whether their relationship can survive the night.

name: Weapons Genius VR
summary: You act as a weapon genius and create ever new types of weapon with better performances.

name: Wet Dog Corp
summary: Race against the clock and clean up these mucky pups! Created by Virtual Reality Development students at Ringling College of Art and Design.

name: Welcome to Graymount
summary: Welcome to Graymount is a narrative VR action-adventure game using advanced locomotion mechanics set on the bleak island of Graymount, featuring "push-forward" combat, wall-running, jumping, and magic.

name: Weapon Hacker
summary: Hack scavenged parts into custom-made weapons and explore / shred your way through a multiverse of infested weapon facilities.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Heart of the Forest
summary:
Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Heart of the Forest throws you deep into a primeval wilderness in the center of modern Europe. It's where the protectors of nature wage their ancient, never-ending war against the forces of destruction.

Visit real-world places of mystery and power. Explore local legends and traditions. Discover the fascinating world and history of the Polish-Belarusian borderlands. You will witness how nature clashes with technology and greed. Can it survive without our help?

name: Welcome Aboard: A Muppet Cruise to Computer Literacy
Web Host Simulator
summary: In Web Host Simulator, a simulator with survival, you have to take care of you and at the same time create the a world's largest websites hosting company in his small apartment. Build your own headquarters, your own data center and deal with different situations and adverse choices.

name: Webkinz Classic
summary:
Webkinz Classic is a multi-award winning virtual world for everyone aged 6+. On Webkinz.com, players discover a whole world of fun, caring and learning, while they adopt and play with their pets, decorate rooms, play games, collect prizes, and chat with their friends!
With over 1,000 pets to adopt, more than 15,000 items to collect, and over 100 games and activities, Webkinz World is a place kids of all ages will enjoy! Content is in English only

name: Wehrschach
summary:
Wehrschach is an almost forgotten tactical chess like game that was released and promoted prior to the Second World War by the German Military to increase the interest in war. It includes a lot of interesting new rules and brings chess to a new level of tactical planning. 
 
Played on a 11x11 squares board with 18 pieces of 5 different types each war party strives to fulfill one of the various goals to win the battle. Will you aim to destroy the enemy infantry or to conquer their main base? Adopt your play to the strategy of your enemy and crush him.

name: Webbed
summary:
Webbed is the story of a happy little spider on an adventure to save her boyfriend from a big mean bowerbird.
Swing through the trees, spin sticky webs, and make friends with bugs! Be the adorable spider you've always wanted to be.

name: Weinende Rose
summary: Hentai action fighting game with hook and level generation.

name: Went.ai
summary:
A new, free and original abstract strategy game.

Chess-like, Go-like.

Two players put move on the board for create a path from their king to the throne. But be careful, avoid the trap on your way...

name: Wedding Planner
summary:
Can charlotte succeed in helping her sister as a wedding planner? Experience the start of finish of all 3 wedding parts: preparations, wedding ceremony and wedding party in
25 different weddings! In both story mode and free mode (accessible when story mode is over) you to can discover what its like to wedding plan in this business simulation,
integrated love story.

name: Wedding Dash: Ready, Aim, Love!
summary: Join Quinn and Cupid on a race for romance in Wedding Dash - Ready, Aim, Love Deluxe, the third chapter of the hit series that critics say, "takes the cake"! Help Quinn and Cupid by planning and running more than 50 fabulous weddings. Featuring all-new couples, guests, disasters, and more, Wedding Dash - Ready, Aim, Love Deluxe is an exciting new chapter in this beloved series of games.

name: Wetware
summary: Explore the interplays between AI ethics and consciousness in the shoes of a researcher tasked to hack an enemy drone to win a war.

name: Werewolf Princess Kaguya
summary: A stylish & exciting action game! Journey through medieval Japan, rendered in beautiful pixel art, to reach the moon and defeat Mother Kaguya!

name: Wet Robot Dreams
Wee Tanks!
summary: Wee Tanks! is a game where you get to battle hundreds of tanks on many different maps. It is an homage to the original game and gives you more tanks, more missions and more game modes! It even has a built-in map editor.

name: Weed Shop 3
summary: Weed Shop 3 is a recreational marijuana dispensary simulator with business management mechanics, FPS action, and a crazy storyline you'd come to expect from the guys who almost smoked crack with Kevin in Tenderloin.

name: We're All Going to Die
summary: We're All Going To Die is a top down cooperative twin stick shooter in which the players face off against waves of enemies. Fight many different enemy types from fast robots that carry bombs to towering lizard people who will smack you around. Fight also against different kinds of bosses, that can be more ranged or melee oriented, all with their own special moves and abilities. Players, if they survive a number of rounds/waves, will be able to choose from a wide range of different perks or abilities and upgrade them later on to give them an edge as the waves get harder and harder the longer they survive.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 1 : The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation
summary: Welcome To... Chichester 1 is the first of a trilogy, and is set in a semi-fictional world where secret organisations covertly battle each other for ideological supremacy.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2: Part I - The Spy Of Chichester And The Eager Tourist Guide
summary: The first part of the second episode of the Welcome To... Chichester trilogy, and details your first day on holiday in Chichester, England

name: We Were Here Forever
summary: You and your fellow prisoner are trapped in the realm of Castle Rock - were you betrayed, or simply not that clever? To escape, you must explore the sinister castle for puzzles and plot your escape together. Secrets and riddles are hidden in the shadows. Just be aware that nothing is what it seems in this mysterious Antarctic adventure. Can you two escape together, or will you be trapped… forever?

name: Wellington's Peninsular Campaign
summary:
The second title covering the "Spanish Ulcer", covers all the major actions not covered in Bonaparte's Peninsular War and quite a few minor ones as well. 
 
Wellington's Peninsular Campaign focuses on four main campaigns - Dec. 1808 - Jan. 1809 culminating with Corunna, Suchet's campaign to secure Spain through 1812, and Wellington's two campaigns to liberate the Peninsula.

name: Weirdlands
summary: A charmingly quirky RPG where you catch and fuse spirits you fight, and layer by layer reveal deep, intricate lore. This single-player, turn-based RPG has a deceptively simple exterior, but within lie complexity and depth. It's bright and it's dark, it's witty and it's silly, and it's one of a kind.

name: West Hunt
summary:
West Hunt is an online social deduction game set in the old west.
It's the perfect game to test your detective and stealth skills with your friends in quick exciting matches.

name: We Are Football
summary: Lead your football club through national championships and to international stardom. Take over an established men's or women's team of your choice as its manager or bring a small team into the big league.

name: We are Broken
summary:
You are in a dark room.
The vampire in front of you wants to know where is the human resistance hideout. You must resist.
Be unbreakable or be broken.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Earthblood: The Exiled One
summary:
This DLC includes:
- The exclusive Cahal The Exiled One outfit
- Dark fur for the Werewolf and Wolf
- An Auspice of Ahroun emblem embroidered on the outfit
Exile was the only option to protect his family. Alone and far away from his loved ones, Cahal's spirit has darkened over time. Put on Cahal's black jacket, proudly display your Ahroun warrior Auspice and transform into a dark wolf to take on those who threaten your pack.

He can transform into a wolf and a Crinos, a huge ferocious beast.
Each form has its advantages: the wolf can sneak around undetected, Cahal as a human can interact with other people, and the Werewolf can unleash its rage to tear enemies apart.

name: Welcome Home
summary: A surreal horror adventure game based on the webcomic of the same name.

name: WebLiero
summary:
WebLiero is a browser-based online-multiplayer clone of the classic 1998 game Liero.

It is a 2D arena shooter in which you control a worm armed with 5 guns and a ninja rope.

It is currently balanced around 1v1 duels but it can support any number of players in a match.

name: Westerlands: Girly runaways story
summary: A runner game in which you have to escape from prison and explore an endless road through the wild west.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Earthblood Champion of Gaia Pack
summary:
The Champion of Gaia pack includes:
- 3 outfits for Cahal
- 4 exclusive furs for the Wolf and Werewolf
- A nature spirit to help you in combat
- A unique finishing move

name: Welcome to the Polyverse
summary: Robert Kane, convinced he is living in a simulation, will do anything he has to in order to get out. He must stop at nothing to unlock the secrets of this world and accomplish his goal.

name: Welcome to Emba
summary: Matthew goes to meet his beloved, who was forced to land on the old base. But there is a catch - he is on a distant planet, where during the breeding phases of the local fauna people see hallucinations.

name: We Surround You
summary: Your orders are to surrender, but you prefer death to dishonor. As you take on the enemy, their general will devote more resources to the fight in hopes of crushing you. He will send helicopters, tanks, planes, artillery barrages, and eventually grab his shotgun and come after you himself.

name: Weltreich: Political Strategy Simulator
summary: Rule the state, lead politics, strategize in this simulator. You can choose your wn political direction.

name: We Are Open
summary: We Are Open is a shopping simulator game, that makes you rely on your memory and perception skills to successfully help everyone complete their shopping lists. The stocks are randomly generated, so demands change up each round as well. And guess what? The shops swap their places too!

name: Wendy Whedon
summary: Free western/fantasy point-and-click adventure game made with Adventure Game Studio.

name: We Are OFK
summary: Start a band in this dreamy, musical TV show from indie pop cuties OFK. Cry, skate, date, and run for your life in 5 interactive music videos, across a heartfelt story of what you risk to chase your dreams.

name: Welcome to Lakewood
summary: Investigate the sleepy town of Lakewood as you follow the trail of numerous missing person cases and the mysterious cause of the disappearances. Unravel the secret of Lakewood and try to survive its tightening grip.

name: Welcome Back
summary: You died! Reincarnate in 5 animals to prove GOD You are worthy of returning to the world in this spiritual adventure. A short, experimental and multi-genre game with 5 gameplay styles, each with its own unique mechanics.

name: West of Loathing: Reckonin' at Gun Manor
summary:
A ghostly carriage arrives in Dirtwater. Only you can see it, and it only goes one place the mysterious Gun Manor.
A brand new West of Loathing adventure, full of all the things you've come to expect from the Loathing brand.
Who can solve the mystery of Gun Manor? Is it you? It's probably you.

name: West of Dead: Path of the Crow Edition
summary: The Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition contains, the Crow familiar, a new level (The Battlefield), new enemy (The Captain), a new weapon (The Mortar).

name: Weapon of Choice DX
summary: Weapon of Choice DX is a high-energy, run 'n' gun where each playable character is unique with their own special weapon and abilities! Blast insane aliens, find new player characters, and choose between branching paths! The world is being taken over by gene-combining beings from beyond the stars! Hideous new creatures are popping up everywhere, and it's up to the Solus Operatives to grab their unique weapons and split some disgusting alien skulls!

name: West of Dead: Crow
summary: The Crow DLC contains, the Crow familiar, a new level (The Battlefield), new enemy (The Captain), a new weapon (The Mortar).

name: We Are Live
summary: A pixelated turn-based JRPG Roguelite where you create your own spells which define how you approach combat. Collect items and craft spells to create your own class-based team of characters!

name: WestLand Adventure
summary: WestLand Adventure - a dynamic 2D platformer. You go through the levels dealing with monsters, collect gold and at the end of the completed level you can spend you cash on improvements (double jumps or unique weapons).

name: WeeRPG
summary: Hack and slash your way through this loot-rich ARPG with up to four local friends. Outfit your classless character to look and play the way you want. Tactical gear combinations and combat skill will determine how deep you can go.

name: Were.Wolf
summary: Were.Wolf is a stealthy puzzle platformer where you play as a young man who is turned into a werewolf. Follow him through a dark and mysterious castle as he tries to reach the potion to lift the curse and escape.

name: Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup
summary: Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup is an all-ages adventure following the young Pup and their astronaut grandfather Pap. The stranded pair investigate a dangerous world. A retro RPG with a modern pace about the seasons of life and loss.

name: Wet Steps
summary: Have a relationship with a charming priestess! An urban fantasy short and brisk visual novel with elements of slavic mythology.

name: Wet Nightmares
summary: As another woman joins the list of the missing, deep within a forest, a man living in solitude is visited by a pretty stranger. Wet Nightmares is an Erotic Horror Visual Novel exploring the psyche of a haunted man and his depraved past.

name: Welcome to Dreamville
summary: Welcome to Dreamville - this is a small adventure in a quiet town called Dreamville. You will face a very simple goal, but with each failure the game will become more difficult.

name: Wet Waifu
summary: Wet Waifu is an exciting puzzle game in which you need to draw a line so that water fills a glass. As a reward, you will gradually discover beautiful drawings.

name: Webcup Soccer
summary: Old-school online arcade soccer game with fast-paced graphics, responsive controls and accurate ball physics.

name: We'll always have Paris
summary: We'll always have Paris is a short narrative experience about loving someone with dementia.

name: We are all but bones and dust
summary: We are all but bones and dust' is a 2D, black and white, adventure game with exploration, multiple Endings and adorable pixel art. Play through this spoopy romance with these cute skeletons!

name: Welcome to Pinehills
summary: An unknown highway led you here. And now you are here alone. Or not alone?

name: Weapons Knight
summary: Trapped and wanting to find your way back to the throne, with a multitude of weapons at your disposal and a fleet of enemies that stop you from progressing, you'll have to fight your way through various terrains to then overthrow the wretched king and claim back what was once yours.

name: Weltorv Estleia
summary: Weltorv Estleia is a non-linear role-playing game set in a medieval fantasy world with its own mythical history and lore. The background story involves a battle between seven legendary warriors, led by the young magician Ten, against an evil dragon. The player assumes the role of a nameless adventurer, male or female, who ventures to the city of Farbell. There, he or she is instructed to join the the Adventurers Guild, and eventually becomes involved in the grand struggle against dark forces threatening Estleia.

name: Wesprau Senki
summary: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Yuwaka. Reclaim your village engulfed by war in this traditional fantasy RPG.

name: We Sing Pop!: Solus Edition
summary: Your Favourite Artists All in One Place

name: Welcome to the Adventurer Inn!
summary: Having just opened an inn, you set out to create a comfortable environment to bring in tired adventurers looking for respite after their questing. Earn money, upgrade your inn, and befriend a diverse cast of characters!

name: We Die
summary: As a Reaper Class 4, Unit 82 (R482), your current job is to collect the remaining souls from a previous reaper's attempt. Your outcome is determined by your exploration, your reaping, and your attitude towards the many lost souls. You only get one chance to make an impression.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 3: Original Episode
summary: The original version of Welcome To... Chichester 3

name: Welcome to... Chichester 2: Part II - No Extra Regrets For the Future
summary: Grendel Jinx is in danger of having to repeat a school year. Refusing to allow this to happen, she enlists the services of the protagonist - her newly found "Best Friend" - and is promptly rebuffed. Grendels drastic actions soon catches the attention of her mother.

name: Wedding
summary: In this 2D horror side-scroller, players navigate the main characters in a classic point and click fashion to explore a house. While hiding from the rampaging monsters, you are to find items to interact with in the otherworldly rooms. Players can enjoy many short plots. There will also be some clues in these short films. The short film is divided by hand to show.

name: Web Dimension
summary:
This game, according to the manual is Darwin's Theory of Evolution turned into a fabulous musical fantasy. There are eight levels of evolution, each having three phases:

Phase 1: Freeze all organisms into energy clusters. To freeze them you have to arrive at an intersection of web strands before an organism gets there. As it approaches hold down the fire button. Do not touch a painted path the organism leaves behind or touch an organism before it reaches the intersection or you will be sent back to the start of this phase.

Phase 2: Stabilize all energy clusters. Go over them with the fire button. You don't have to be at an intersection for this. Their don't leave a painted path but you do. Touching this sends you back to the start of this phase.

Phase 3: The transitional phase that moves you to the next level with a musical reward. Music, lights and color. A new epoch is about to begin.

The game is viewed in a 3D perspective with the web stretching into the back of the screen. You appear as a note starting right at the front of the screen. You use the joystick to move about the web and use the fire button to enlarge. There are no lives to the game and no end. You finish when you switch it off.

name: Welcome to Graystone
summary: Welcome to Graystone! Once believed to be the human race's next home, you are left alone after an asteroid hits the planet. Survive in an open-world environment, unfit for humans. Few resources remain, and must be rationed to survive. Will you band together, or fight to the survive?

name: Weakpoint Delta
summary: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.

name: Wednesday Basketball
summary: Live a year in a small town basketball association. Follow the stories of Fanny, Alex, Remy, Ajiba, Laura, Odile, Benjamin, Amir, Kariem and Meng as the season passes by. Some will join, some will leave. Relax and play some basketball.

name: We Need to Go Deeper: The Atomique
summary: The submersible of tomorrow! This DLC will grant you access to this enormous nuclear-powered vessel and all its technological wonders!

name: Weldon
summary: "Weldon" is a procedurally generated roguelike for the Nintendo Game Boy/Game Boy Color developed in GB Studio to see what's possible with game boy studio in terms of making a roguelike along the lines of Konami's classic Game Boy hidden gem "Cave Noire".

name: Welcome to GameCube World!!
summary:
Welcome to GameCube World!! (also known by the informal name Peach's Castle) is a tech demo for Nintendo GameCube. In 2001, Nintendo sent various developers an interactive Tech Demo in order to show them the graphical capabilities of their new console as part of the Nintendo GameCube Software Development Kit. In this demo, the player controls a red arrow that can go through various places in Peach's Castle from Super Mario 64. In different rooms it shows different graphical effects, which includes the following: large textures, bumps and shadows, anti-aliasing, local lighting, projection textures, environment mapping, and maximum polygons.

The castle is referred to in the game as Peach Castel (castel is an old French word for castle).

name: We Are Here Because of Those That Are Not
summary:
Welcome to the Pro Black, Pro Trans archive. This interactive archive was made to store and centre black trans people to preserve our experiences, thoughts, feelings, our lives and to remember us even when we are at the risk of being erased.

Your own identity will determine how you can interact with the archive.

name: Well Balanced
summary: Well Balanced is a new type of puzzle game for people love brain teasers like Sudoku. Players must calculate and adjust various weights in order to key everything in balance. Well Balanced offers up to 60 levels to improve your skills in calculation and physical comprehension. The more the accurate the calculation, the higher will be the score.

name: We Don't Talk About It
summary: Art-horror game about how hard it can be to express yourself

name: Weltschmerz
summary: this world is no comfort to either of you.

name: We Got Another Year
summary: Rob is trying to balance college, friends and work, but destiny is about to throw someone new into his path.

name: Web Runner
summary: You are a man on a giant web, filled with all sorts of insects. Those insects are out for your blood but luckily you can shoot them. The main goal, however, is to plant bombs on the sides of the web and then return to your starting point. The insects can destroy those bombs so you better hurry up!

name: Werlocks.io
summary: A battle royale style game where you plays as wizards who attack each other with spells. You can upgrade spells as the round progresses, and unlock new spells.

name: Welcome to Hell
summary: A not specifically difficult in terms of mechanics platformer game, but the mechanics are pushed to their limits to make your life a living hell the entire time playing.

name: Welcome to Goodland
summary:
This is the police + Ozark TV Show = Welcome to Goodland

An ordinary salaryman is forced to work under a merciless Mexican cartel. Stay alive for as long as you can, get enough money for your new bosses, make tough decisions, acquire businesses and find allies you can trust. But in this cutthroat world, will you be able to keep to your humanity?

name: Were House
summary:
By accident, Dori stumbles across the monstrous secret behind popular haunted house, the Were House - and then they get roped into working alongside the crew on Halloween night!
A job's a job, right? But will Dori make it through three days of hard work preparing for the big night - and will they grow closer to any of the monsters...?
Were House is a comedic visual novel with dashes of romance! There are three routes to pursue: werewolf Cormac, kelpie Morag, and gorgon Esseth.

name: Welcome to the Galaxy
summary: A small space shoot-em-up game in which every wave is built by hand.

name: Wednesday
summary: A short story about dreams.

name: Welcome_Owner
summary: Everybody lives in giant robot houses now.

name: Welcome To... Chichester: The Spy of America and the Long Vacation
summary: Your plans for a mountaineering holiday are thwarted by your nemesis from a rival organisation - the much feared Grendel Jinx

name: Welcome To... Chichester 2 : The Spy Of America And The Eager Tourist Guide
summary: Continuing from where Episode 1 left off, the protagonist still believes he is in America. When faced with the truth, however, his world falls apart. What will it take to get him back on his feet ? And what secrets are being kept from him ?

name: Weapons Simulator: OutDoor Edition
summary: This game is not a mainstream FPS. It is a simulation focused on real effects and challenges that comes when shooting a real firearm and that is usually not present in mainstream FPS's. So, prepare yourself for a new challenge!

name: Weasel Words
summary: You're a taxidermy weasel come to life, but for how long? Learn about art by pressing space when you see a yellow arrow above the piece you're near. You'll be challenged to type a message as fast as you can. You can only interact with art at or below your level.

name: Welcome Home 2
summary: David is trapped in his grandmother's basement, help him escape! Warning for flashing images and disturbing imagery

name: Welcome to the Mansion Remastered
summary: A RPG game where you have to escape a mansion which is infested by a ghost killer created by one of the major characters. You'll need to find out who is the creator and eventually get out of the house.

name: Welcome to the Cursed Bookshop we also stock other things
summary: Everybody loves cursed books, but this bookshop is trying to diversify.

name: Welcome Archaeology Enthusiast
summary: Do you love archaeology? Explore interesting buildings and architecture in this, 1-bit, Abstract game!

name: Welcome Home
summary:
Do I really want to go home?

A spooky visual novel that revolves around a man and his past.

name: Weightless
summary: A meditative virtual reality experience about inspecting space debris in a weightless environment.

name: Werewolf in the Wild
summary: Run free as a werewolf in your very own weirdscape.

name: We are kings
summary: Who knew there could be two kings to one castle?

name: Welcome
summary: This short, 2D, visual novel is about a trans woman trying to get home from work at night. It's closely based on a true story of threat, manipulation, transphobia, misgendering and sexism.

name: Weave
summary: An abstract journey of two people, who are both trying to cope with a shared event in different ways.

name: Welcome to the Colony
summary: Short fanart game showing how I imagine the remake of Gothic.

name: We're Getting There
summary: A five-minute experience about a trans theory.

name: We Need the Sun
summary: You need to reach the sun... Explore 16 randomly appearing levels on a quest to reach the sun, racking up scores through collecting coins... One problem though, you can only move by jumping. That means only one method of transport and one goal.

name: Weird Simulator
summary: The game doesn't copy real life, it surpasses real life. Player is free to do whatever he wants: play on the stock exchange, get an academic degree, blogger, musician, traveler, boxing champion, create a business, find love, make real friends, or get a job for a five-day week, drink and sleep.

name: Welcome to the Adamant Maintenance Monitoring Terminal
summary:
> the heating again?

Year 3174 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: We Dwell in Possibility
summary: We Dwell in Possibility is a queer gardening simulation shaped by intimacy and politics. It's the third world premiere in the Virtual Factory series, inviting artists to imagine new worlds in response to the physical architecture and artistic ambition of MIF's future home.

name: We Hidden
summary: A 2D Top Down Hide and Seek Strategy game with cute chameleons!.

name: We Were Here Series Bundle
summary: Get all three games in the We Were Here Series in one handy bundle! These co-op puzzle adventures are centered around the sinister Castle Rock in deepest Antarctica.

name: Weekly Jump Heroes Battle! My Collection 2
We are Blacksmith
summary: 'We are Blacksmith' is action game created dot image. Became the blacksmith, and adventure the cave, mine the materials, battle to monsters. Cast the products and the weapons, the protectors. And sell to created items.

name: Welcome to Empyreum
summary: Welcome to Empyreum is a local co-op party game up to 4 players. The main goal is to organize and clean numerous floors of the hotel with mechanics involving everyday chores (vacuuming or making the bed), and crazy tasks like taking care of alien babies and chasing ghosts away!

name: Weird Cinema
summary: If you were put in a horror movie, would you survive? Play multiple roles in various classic horror films. Try to survive in horror films by decrypting and fighting

name: Welcome to Your Immune System
summary: Welcome to Your Immune System is an addictive retro arcade-style video game where you defend human cells from invading bacteria. Use all the weapons in your arsenal from macrophages, killer T cells, to cytokines and learn how these work in real life.

name: Wekufu
summary: A Dark, Hand Drawn 2D Hack and Slash Platformer. Play as Sakinko, a young warrior set on a quest to avenge her father’s death and protect her people from the evil spirits that now menace her land, these evil spirits take the name of Wekufu.

name: Weiter
summary: Weiter - is a colorful platformer with a wide variety of game mechanics and enemies, as well as battles with insidious bosses. Go through this adventure in unique locations, overcoming difficulties, traps and fight with the evil king.

name: Welcome Home
summary: This is a secret room to escape burning brain puzzle work, which is divided into five chapters, puzzle level interesting design, complicated and confusing story, criticism and comment on the real society, is full of exquisite everywhere.

name: We are Eva
summary: Play the game in multiple dimensions at the same time, traveling between them whenever you like! Doesn't it sound fun? My name is Eva, by the way, I'm the main protagonist of the game you're looking at, and I promise we'll have fun. If you add me to your wishlist, of course. *wink wink*

name: Well-Beings: Wellness for Kids
summary: Well-Beings: Wellness for Kids features creative, active and thought-provoking experiences designed with experts in children's psychology to teach healthy habits that will help you feel good about yourself and the world around you.

name: We Were Friends
summary: A Battle Royal mode to finally know who is the best between you and your friends and a Prop Hunt mode (not implemented yet) to discover or rediscover the best of the caches.

name: WEGO: WW2 Stalingrad
summary: WEGO World War II: Stalingrad is the flagship of Brian Kelly's operational level, ground-centric, WEGOWW2 game system. Built on the framework of Desert War 1940-42, this hex-based wargame captures the drama of the epic German offensive to capture the industrial city of Stalingrad in the Summer of '42. It consists of a series of historical scenarios and campaigns that allow the players to explore the ebb and flow of the actual combat operations. It’s playable by both sides using hotseat, versus the AI, or Play By Email.

name: Welcome to a Sexy, Open World!
summary: When the young Sejima Seiya tries to rescue a dog, the passing truck winds up sending him straight into a completely different world! In this brand new world, Seiya finds himself caught up in an ancient prophecy that someone from another world will arrive to give birth to the legendary heroes that will end the wars plaguing the lands. What is Seiya to do as key women from every major nation in this new world start accosting him for his baby batter in an attempt to ensure their nation holds the most influence over the heroes destined to be born?!

name: Welcome to Free Will: Episode 1
summary: Welcome to Free Will - Episode 1 is the first episode of a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel game. You play as a young man who travels to a small town looking for his missing mother. As you soon find out, the town is packed with many beautiful women.

name: Welcome Home
summary: Horror Stories: Welcome Home is a murder mystery that you play both backwards and forwards.

name: West Water
summary: West Water. Population? You. Loot, Run & Survive.

name: We Bare Bears: Bearsketball
summary: The Bears are playing a street basketball tournament and need your help to win the trophy!

name: Welcome to the Backrooms
summary: There must be an exit somewhere. Keep your wits about you as you traverse a seemingly endless labyrinth of dingy yellow walls and moldy carpet. Find candy bars and almond water to keep your strength, and stay out of the shadows to keep your sanity.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Earthblood Champion of Gaia Edition
summary:
You are Cahal, a powerful Garou who chose to go into exile after losing control of his destructive rage. On his quest for redemption and blood, Cahal plays a crucial role in the great war between the Garous and Endron, a powerful oil company that serves the Wyrm, whose destruction is ravaging the planet.
He can transform into a wolf and a Crinos, a huge ferocious beast.
Each form has its advantages: the wolf can sneak around undetected, Cahal as a human can interact with other people, and the Werewolf can unleash its rage to tear enemies apart.

The Champion of Gaia edition includes:
- Full game
- 3 outfits for Cahal
- 4 exclusive furs for the Wolf and Werewolf
- A nature spirit to help you in combat
- A unique finishing move

name: West Game
summary: A war game set in the Wild West. Build up your town, train troops, research, attack and defend against other towns, capture buildings for boosts, participate in events, grow stronger with your alliance, and more.

name: We Survive Tonight
summary: Survival Horror Roguelite RPG with 1-4 co-op. Hours after the outbreak, you are left stranded in the forest that became your safe-haven. Battle through procedurally generated areas, manage your time wisely as each day passes, build your community and survive!

name: Weapons of Ra
summary:
Experience the next generation of iPhone gaming. The game combines tower defense type gaming with an FPS. The game features beautiful 3d graphics and unique play style. Can you master the Weapons of Ra.
Warning: Due to the high end nature of the graphic fidelity the game will only preform properly on the iPhone 5c and up.

name: Wellboy
summary:
What can you do if you have your head in the clouds and you fall down a well, because you even forget to look where you are going?
Keep on smiling and hold on tighter to your balloon like brave little Wellboy!

name: Weed Farmer
summary: Welcome Weed Farmer! Get ready to accept the challenges and reap the rewards as you increase your grow skill and bank account by farming 30 different strains of cannabis plants. Manage each stage of a plant's growth and production, from seed germination to the final harvest, you control it all.

name: We Are One
summary: Work together with yourself in VR! We Are One is a puzzle shooter where you solve mind-bending puzzles by cloning yourself and playing with time loops. Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your own clones - the only help you really need (and get) is yourself!

name: We are definitely the baddies
summary: A minimalist city builder where only profits matter. Build factories and extract everything before you are forced to leave the planet.

name: WestFallen
summary: Story-driven open world RPG that throws you into a grand adventure in the world of WestFallen. Explore, quest, and fight your way through the world as you seek to avenge your family. Explore and experience the world of WestFallen as you follow the story or go your own way.

name: Weird Hat Fight
summary: Weird Hat Fight is a party game where you use magical hats to fight your friends to the death.

name: We Were Kidnapped
summary: In the Industrial Age, forced to work cleaning chimneys from Birmingham's houses, a boy named George decides to run away from his shelter into the unknown hoping to find a better place to live. Help him getting away from the city and face the challenges that will be found in the journey.

name: Weddle
summary:
Guess the NFL player in as few tries as possible
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change depending on how close your guess was to the player
In any column, green represents a match
In the division column, yellow represents the correct conference but not the correct division
In the height, age, and weight column, yellow represents that the correct number is within 2 (inches, years, numbers) of the player

name: We Are Not All Alone Unhappy
summary: “We Are Not All Alone Unhappy” is a short interactive narrative piece made in Twine which interrogates the idea of the Shakespearean happy ending. It asks players to create a pairing between two characters who received canonically unhappy endings in Shakespeare’s plays.

name: We Took That Trip
summary: A chill narrative experience through procedural and relaxing landscapes. Appreciate the reunion with your best friends, explore the road and it's fantastic things. Turn the radio on, it's time to enjoy this emotional ride.

name: Weeping Falls Massacre
summary: 80's horror inspired FPS, a nightmarish scene taking place at an abandoned orphanage.

name: WebSurf
summary: Surf the web in 3d with your friends!

name: Welcome to Albion!
summary: Elf Nation and Mazoku Nation were on the brink of war. In order to save both nations, the Son of God from Elf Nation (you) headed into Albion, a city in enemy territory...

name: Weben Blocks
summary:
Connect the same numbers and get the biggest tile you can get!

Reach the highest score and share it with your friends!

name: We'll Meet Once More
summary:
Every day is the same. Go to school, stare out the window. Go home, play video games. Your life is a blur of monotony that repeats over and over…

Until a transfer student breezes into your life, changing your world forever.

name: Weird City Interloper
summary:
An interactive tale of strange conspiracy.

Pull up your hood, lower your gaze and enter the city of Zendon. If you can gather enough information, you may just be able to change the course of history.

(Weird City Interloper is a shallow but broad conversation game.)

name: We See You
summary: We See You is a rhythm based down-scrolling runner. You play as a pair of eyes trying to go as deep as possible, avoiding enemies moving in different patterns with a goal to get a good score to top the leaderboard.

name: Western Dual Wield
summary: Western theme Voxel Graphics Forced-scrolling twin-stick shooter

name: Welcome to Genius High!
summary:
A natural thinker with the ability to assess any situation, identify the optimal strategy, and execute it in the blink of an eye...

You are a true genius.

Until now, you’ve never met an equal, but all that’s about to change when you’re drafted into an elite school that caters solely to the skills of those like you…

name: Welcome to Jane's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
Westurn
summary:
Westurn: Turn Based Showdowns is a turn based Western (Westurn?) full of high stakes cowboy duels, mind games, and tactical thinking!

Block bullets and shoot bandits when they're off their guard, all while hastily reloading your own gun before they catch you off of yours. Use your sharp mind and sharp shooting to figure out your foe's tactics and use it against them!

Streamers can even invite their own audience members to a duel in 1v1 PvP Showdowns to settle whose the sharpest shooter once and for all!

In PvE, players take the role of the Shadeless Sheriff - travelling across the Endless Wasteland while outsmarting outlaws and hunting down their notorious Gang leaders. Each with their own unique territory, weapons, and dueling style.

name: Weaver
summary: A daily word game, based on Lewis Carroll's word ladder. Players must change one word into another valid word, one letter at a time, until they have made the target word.

name: Welcome to Folklore Manor!
summary:
Living away from your parents involves a lot of responsibility, but things become twice as interesting when you go house-hunting and meet some interesting new friends. They’re not just pretty girls—they’re yokai, spirits of the supernatural from ancient folklore!

Can you play the role of hero and save the yokai from an evil corporation run by greedy humans? And above all, will you make these girls fall in love with you at the end? Control your destiny in this thrilling yet romantic adventure!

name: Welcome to Mark's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
Welcome to Pammy's Story in the World of Project: Summer Ice
Western City Renovator
summary: Welcome to western city simulator Discover and restore abandoned cities and locations. Complete missions and assignments for Western Rail Company on a planned railroad route. Bring back to live ghost towns and solve the problems of the Wild West. Build your dream western city.

name: Welcome to Chornobayivka VR
summary: At that day the Russians start a miss planed attack against the Ukraine, Joe grabs his preferred weapon to stop the Zombie Russian Soldiers that got infected by a sick experiment of Putin. Fight for democracy and freedom in a wave like horror VR shooter experience for free.

name: Weed Runner
summary: Weed Runner is a drug dealing, crime fueled, story driven, point and click adventure.

name: We. The Refugees: Ticket to Europe
summary: A socially engaged existential visual novel based on a huge number of choices and consequences. Become a journalist who pretends to be a refugee and tries to cross the Mediterranean Sea illegally to do research for his upcoming book. Inspired by true events.

name: We don't die here
summary: An unknown enemy has descended on your world. Population decimated from 10 billion to a little over 100 survivors. This is your extinction event. You, Empress Asa, refuse to accept this. But, you are about to be overrun...

name: Webgeon Speedrun Edition
summary: Webgeon Speedrun Edition is a Arcade Speedrun Game, You have to be fast, yes you have to be fast, Can you finish 20 levels in the fastest time?

name: Wega: Lost in the Outer Reaches
summary: Sci-fi survival game inspired by Subnautica and Star Wars. Drive speeder bike, collect resources, craft and explore an alien word.

name: Weekday Warrior
summary: Weekday Warrior is a mod for Half-Life 2. It was developed by students at the Guildhall at the Southern Methodist University (SMU) in University Park, Texas. Development started in January 2006 and finished June 7, 2006, the date the mod was released. It received the Best Mod and Best Singleplayer FPS Mod awards in the 2007 Independent Games Festival.

name: Welcome to the World of ZJ the Ball
We Can Make It
summary: You and your friends will team up to face the world in this third person challenge. Do your best to stay alive and try to be stealthy. This game has permadeath and relies on planning ahead so you can stay alive. Whether it be zombies, players, or AI, they are all out to get your blood.

name: Weird Japan
summary: Weird Japan is a role-playing game in which the main character returns from the war with the Crusaders.During the war, the world has changed and he will have to take one of the sides.Explore a fantasy alternative medieval Japan.

name: Wedgie Simulator
summary: 1, 2, 3. ATOMIC. WEDGIE. ACTION! Give people wedgies in several different angles and poses. Take screenshots. Animate. Make a video. Upload it online.

name: Wetory
summary: A child abandoned from the world immediately after birth due to a congenital disease When all the colors of the world were taken away by the villain, Realizing that his illness is the power to defeat the villain, Join us in our adventure to regain the color which lost to the villain!

name: Weapons of the Gods
summary:
WOG or Weapons of the Gods is the Chinese online multiplayer RPG in which Gods and Demons battle each other for the artefacts known as the Weapons of the Gods. Running on Unreal Engine 3, this game truly stands out with its stunningly beautiful sceneries, fluid-feeling movement, impressive special effects, and dynamic shadows.

Gods and demons have fought for power over this world for many millennia, but neither side could prevail. It was decided to place the fate of the world in the hands of mortals by sending the Weapons of the Gods down to earth. These weapons are so peculiar, so powerful, so fascinating, that no human can ever resist the appeal. Sooner or later, either the gods will prevail and the earth shall bend before their will, or the demons will win and plunge the entire world into chaos and madness.

name: Weird RPG
summary: "Weird RPG" is a highly difficult and fast-paced action RPG game focusing on boss battle,

name: Web3War
summary:
Web3War, the multiplayer shooter developed by Roll1ng Thund3rz and incubated by Zilliqa, delivers an exciting and competitive FPS experience that rivals the top shooting games on the market.
The game offers action-packed gameplay, tactical maps, custom load-outs, weapon skins, progression, and many more of the features found in many of the best FPS games.

Web3War also uses blockchain technology to allow players to earn valuable rewards from playing the game. Unlike most other Web3 games,

name: Weaponeer
summary: Control your character with two buttons and fight your way through 90+ levels of retro platforming that introduce new and original content.

name: West Fantasy
summary: Western Fantasy is an independent game based on cowboys and post-modern science fiction. The story takes place in A.D2573, players will play the protagonist "River*Clint" and embark on exciting adventures in the overhead world called the western continent.

name: Wenjia: Complete Edition
summary:
Wenjia Complete Edition Includes:
- Wenjia Base Game
- Wenjia Music OST

name: Welcome to James' Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
summary: Welcome to James' story in the World of Our Church and Halloween!

name: WetBread
summary: WetBread is a 2.5D Metroidvania Platformer, where you gain control of a Dry Husk, travel thorugh the store shelves of various departments, solve puzzles and fight enemies and bosses.

name: Welcome to Erin's Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
summary: A game in the "Our Church and Halloween" series!

name: Wee Survivors
summary: Blast your way through thousands of aliens in this casual retro inspired shooter. Build your character from an array of weapons and powerful upgrades, which make each new playthrough unique!

name: Werewolf Tycoon
summary:
Become the Big Bad Wolf of Werewolf Park in this werewolf stealth simulation game.
Eat as many people as you can, but pace yourself, try not to be seen, and do not let witnesses escape! After all, things could get tricky if too many people become aware of your existence!
Happy munching!

name: We Ramble I: Starwake
summary: “We Ramble I: Starwake” is a role-playing game with management elements. Live the life you want in a fantasy world and find your true self! The rogue-lite element makes your exploration no longer boring, but watch out for the being in the dark abyss - it doesn't want you to have a happy life.

name: We Might Die
summary: Salvage Spaceships, Gear Up, Survive the Alien Swarm. Mech-based survival game set in deep space, where an alien swarm is quickly approaching your home ship. You and your team of robots will salvage procedurally-generated ships to gain the resources you need to escape the star system intact.

name: We Happy Few: Digital Deluxe Edition
Welcome to Scott's Story in the World of Our Church and Halloween: Visual Novel
We Are Football: National Teams
summary: Become the football world champion: Make the dream of all football players and coaches come true with We Are Football. The National Teams DLC adds all international games to the main game.

name: We Dream Standing Up
summary: A short narrative game about two women dealing with life and death in a post-apocalyptic, dying world.

name: Western Press: TF2 Heavy
summary: Gaming's favourite Heavy Weapons Guy has found himself 2Far west of 2Fort. Armed with only a minigun and a (never ending) Sandvich, his only way back to the war on BLU is through the cowfolk he's surrounded by.

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie
summary:
We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie is a remaster of the PS2 game We Love Katamari.

The second title in the Katamari Damacy series has returned in a remastered, powered-up version! This new reroll comes with improved graphics and gameplay enhancements. In Royal Reverie, roll up katamari as the King of All Cosmos in his boyhood!

name: Welcome to the World of Zippy the Circle: Visual Novel
summary: Welcome to the World of Zippy the Circle: Visual Novel tells the story of Zippy and his adventures as part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Web Power Dolls
summary: A browser-based spinoff from Kogado Studio's all-female mecha series Power Dolls. Online service was discontinued in 2014.

name: We Have a Frog Problem
summary: A circular toy with frogs, physics, and jokes

name: Wet Dreams
summary: Wet Dreams is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: We Are Not Alone
summary: "We are Not Alone" is an alien-themed game inspired by the trashy horror movies of the 80s, with retro graphics and scary and even comical moments.

name: Welcome to the World of Nik and Kit
summary:
A game in the "Nik and Kit" series!
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Weapon Merge
summary: Upgrade your military power! Merge 2 of the same weapons to get stronger weapons! What’s the strongest weapon you can make?

name: Welcome Home Jacob
summary: "Welcome Home Jacob" is a dark and unnerving experience targeted at mature audiences. It was made in under 72 hours for the Meatly Jam.

name: WekaInvaders
summary:
Each one of Weka Invaders' 40 levels consists of a certain number of blocks which hide several Wekas that will eventually emerge and chase Waimanu, and even shoot at him sometimes.

Waimanu should drive each Weka out of the blocks and eliminate them before the time runs out. Wekas can be eliminated by either shooting at them or by shaking them off the floor.

Points are awarded for each block destroyed and for each eliminated Weka. Also, points are given for destroying the passing UFO, for powerup pickups and for each second left after completing the level. An additional life is awarded when 25,000 points are reached and you can earn one more life every additional 50,000 points after that.

name: Welcome Azrael
summary:
An alleged time traveller was found trespassing on private property in the region of Anthem and is now incarcerated in a Police Department in Phoenix, Arizona.

On your first day of fieldwork, you were given the task to scour through his digital belongings to find the source of the man’s apparent unbalance.

A colleague of yours from the Police Department sent you some valuable exhibits to start with; the inmate seems physically constrained in relation to disclosing his computer’s password. And no one could hack into the system by any means.

name: Weeny Adventure
summary:
Weeny adventure is a tiny challenging platformer game in pixel art style like an old-school game that brings back childhood memories.

Your mission is to run and jump and to grab all the gems before time runs out to find the hidden map to win the level. Your adventure journey is not easy, because you will encounter deadly traps and dangerous monsters.

name: Wendy's Quest
summary: Venture to find your friends and complete Wendy's Quest.

name: WeddingRun
summary:
"Wedding run" is simple but new type running game.
(Actually it isn't as easy as that...very hard.)

name: Wet Sand
summary: Erotic visual novel about adventures of Fabian Brook and his crew in Savage Waters. Explore the world with unique creatures and choose a beloved woman.

name: Webcam Sex
summary: Webcam Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: We Are the Universe
summary: Sci-fi tower defense where you create your own maze, manage drones and power levels, and harvest for resources. Upgrade your turrets, buildings and ground units. Upgrade and buy new vehicles and motherships.

name: Weekend Warriors MMA
summary: The engine behind 3D wrestling brings the revolution to MMA, where real resistance challenges you to survive each round! Embark on a career to climb the ranks at 5 unique promotions with their own weight classes, or become the boss in the sport's 1st fully playable "Promoter" mode.

name: Web or Dead
summary: Be a spider battling to survive in this challenging platformer. Swing, leap and glide as you race to stay ahead of the rising lava but take care, there are many perils waiting in the deep!

name: Web Crawlies
summary: Web Crawlies - Due to a Lab Accident at the Pesticide Factory, All of the pests on Earth have grown 100 times their normal size, and the air is toxic to humans. You and your team are the last remaining people, can you survive?

name: We the People
summary: The Year is 2028. You are a Survivor, one of the few left amongst the living dead. You must Fight to Survive in this Hardcore Shooter based in Post-Apocalyptic America. Will you help to rebuild humanity, or take what they've gathered for yourself? We The People refuse to go quietly into the night!

name: Welcome to Free Will: Episode 3
summary: Welcome to Free Will - Episode 3 is the third episode of a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel game. You play as a young man who travels to a small town looking for his missing mother. As you soon find out, the town is packed with many beautiful women.

name: We're Party Together!
summary: Easy to understand and simple casual game. Let's play 10 mini-games using WASD and arrow keys and run for a new record!

name: Web no Naka no Kanojo: Password ni Himerareta Nazo
summary: Main character is a university student. He uses internet just for nanpa (meeting women), but once got interested in the ruined village sinking into the dam by accident. Strange things start to happen around the hero - first he starts to receive intimidation letters, then his informant suddenly dies...

name: Weezle
summary: Weezle is a web-based word game created by Rivers Cuomo and programmer Marcus Ng. The game is a Weezer-themed clone of Wordle, the popular word game created by Josh Wardle.

name: West of Dead: Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Path of the Crow Deluxe Edition contains:
- The Game.
- The Crow familiar, a friend to our hero. The crow will stay by your side through the darkest of paths.
- A new level, The Battlefield. Dilapidated and riven with rot and decay, the land here has been shattered and burned by explosions, with a fog-filled with the calls to charge. This level is the epitome of all war and it is yours to battle through.
- A new enemy, The Captain, a truly frightening opponent, maddened by his lust for war. He is armed with a cannon and a sabre, this menace is trouble close or afar.
- A new weapon, The Mortar, claimed from The Battlefield, this new weapon will terrify even those cowering behind cover.
- A new blessing, Strength, with this, you'll be able to punch down steel doors and land a mean hook on the denizens in your way.

name: Welcome to Levy
summary: All the women in Levy have disappeared. Why did they leave in bare feet? Discover their story along with 680 CGs and 11 unique endings in this apocalyptic visual novel.

name: Well...
summary:
Welcome to "Well...", a very difficult first-person precision platformer with engaging lore and storyline! In this game, you'll find yourself in a mysterious magic well with a few strange rats. To climb your way out of this unfamiliar terrain, you must strafe platform to platform while relying on your intuition for navigation. Along the way, you'll discover and collect hidden journals; these will enlighten you on the well's history. Four levels must be beat in order to save this perplexing world. The levels progress in difficulty, making your journey continually more rewarding and rage-inducing.

With its intuitive controls and fun gameplay, "Well..." is the perfect game for anyone who loves a good platformer with a twist. So why not join us on this adventure and see what lies waiting at the bottom of the well?

name: Westgrove
summary: Westgrove is a game that focuses as much as possible on emulating the ps1 era gaming experience with horror elements and follows a found footage story style with inspiration from some 90's movies.

name: Weggye's Adventures
summary: Weggye's Adventures is a 2D platformer game. Which focuses on skill. The player explores a magical world full of challenges with Weggye.

name: Weird Shit is Going to Happen
summary: Weird Shit Is Going to Happen is an adult visual novel where weird shit is going to happen. The game is built around a lot of little side stories. As you are exploring these unusual stories, you will try to build a Harem with girls you meet in these side stories.

name: We Will Get revenge
summary: We Will Get Revenge is a challenging Roguelite-Shoot'Em Up game with interesting mechanics and physics in which you will have to take revenge on those who destroyed the earth. Battle, upgrade, die, and repeat. Unlock weapons, enemies, missions, mutators, ships and much more with each game.

name: Welcome Kokuri-san
summary: Welcome Kokuri-san is a visual novel starring the VTuber Kurune Kokuri. The story is fully voiced, and will include scenes with realistic ASMR voices, so you can enjoy the scenario “as if you were there.”

name: We're Back! A Dinosaur's Story
summary: This version features characters from the movie, but does not follow the storyline of the movie. In this version, Professor Screw Eyes has kidnapped Louie and Cecilia. Hearing of this, Captain Neweyes and the dinosaurs launch into action to save their friends by traveling through various time periods.

name: We Want You
summary: We Want You is a procedural war platformer with a satirical flavor. Try and fight your way through enemy territory back to your allied camp.

name: WebCum Empire Tycoon
summary: WebCum Empire Tycoon is a casual clicker adult game where you can create your own modeling agencyThe player takes control of the webcam models. Manages the girls' daily errands/activities and to keep them stress-free.

name: WeAreDreaming
summary: WeAreDreaming is a Chinese Yume NIkki fangame. You play as Zakurotsuki (附石榴), who refuses to leave her room. Exploring the dream world can also unlock wallpapers, music and menu skins.

name: We Are Poems
summary: A swim through the queerest region of deep space. Its inhabitants float and gravitate in bountiful joyous explosions of light, embracing the void as a place to thrive.

name: Wendigo Hunter
summary: As a chosen member of a cult you will try to hunt down a mythological creature hiding deep in dungeons. Will you succeed or the next hunter will need to be chosen?

name: Western Quest
summary: Western Quest is a Western/Steampunk 16-bit JRPG with turn-based combat. The story is about Clyde, a lost wanderer who travels from town to town seeking revenge.

name: Webcott Dungeon
summary: Platform with Absko's wall climbing or web swinging and gain an advantage in turn-based combat by finding ways to separate your foes! Time your attacks and defend your friends as you fight your way into this subterranean, under-siege village!

name: Webosaurs
summary: Webosaurs is a former MMORPG, which involved a virtual world containing online games and activities, developed by American studio Reel FX Entertainment. Players could use cartoon dinosaur-avatars and play in a landscape-set world, with a variety of different themes.

name: Webkinz Next
summary: Build your family of pets in the home of your dreams while playing fun games and hanging out with friends.

name: Webkinz Friends
summary: Ganz brings the fun of Webkinz to Facebook with a new social twist, enabling parents and teens to build the Kinzville of their dreams with the added benefit of sending prizes to any Webkinz World account from Facebook.

name: Weak Soul
summary: Get up. There is no place in this world for those who are weak. I must free the continent from the demons before they get rid of me. Any choice can change someone's fate. But I will fight as long as the flame of my soul burns.

name: West Country Mayhem
summary: Fight to survive from horde of hunters. Choose from a variety of guns and upgrades to create an ultimate killing machine!

name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN: Omnibus Edition
summary: Welcome To... Chichester OVN: Omnibus Edition contains OVN 1, 2 and 3 in one program, with updated in-game GUI, full stops added and slight story enhancements.

name: Weyrdlets
summary: Weyrdlets is a relaxing desktop pet game where you can collect cute items, decorate your home and bring a virtual pet onto your desktop when you need a loving companion!

name: Western War
summary: Western War - This is a 2D rail shooter with a top-down view of shooting enemies, with each level their number and speed increase, and you must use two revolvers to shoot enemies and reload the revolvers in time so as not to end up in the pit for the dead.

name: Western Rye
summary: Welcome to the harsh and lawless world of the Wild West, where a mysterious fever called the 'Rye Fever' has turned the once-proud frontier into a lawless wasteland. In this world, survival is the only law, and you'll need to be tough, quick-witted, and deadly if you hope to make it out alive.

name: We Are Out of Food, Milton.
summary: "We Are Out of Food, Milton." is a visual novel/walking sim about having to go to the grocery store even though you really don't want to.

name: Weird West: Definitive Edition
summary: Discover a dark fantasy reimagining of the Wild West where lawmen and gunslingers share the frontier with fantastical creatures. Journey through the story of a group of atypical heroes, written into legend by the decisions you make in an unforgiving land. Each journey is unique and tailored to the actions taken - a series of high stakes adventures where everything counts and the world reacts to the choices you make. Form a posse or venture forth alone into an otherworldly confines of the Weird West and make each legend your own.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names
summary: Save the living earth with Rage and spirit! Awaken ancient mysteries, rebuild your fallen pack, and unleash your fearsome might to heal a shattered land. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition contains the We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie game along with the Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack.

[Set Contents]
Main Game
Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack

■Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack
