name: We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie: Special Edition
summary:
The second title in the Katamari Damacy series has returned in a remastered, powered-up version!

We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie is a fully remastered version of We Love Katamari Damacy, originally released in 2005, with new and improved graphics and gameplay enhancements to make it easier to jump in and have fun.

The Special Edition contains We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie, the Little Prince Costume, and the Katamari Damacy Series Music Bundle.

name: Weird Store
summary:
You dream of becoming a famous item maker in this world, and in order to fulfill your cherished dream, you need to improve your skills by running this shop.
But running a shop isn't easy: you need to get the materials you need to create the items your customers request, and you have to pay the shop taxes every day. You also have to deal with the fact that your customers might be unhappy with the items you create.
You need to keep your shop open for a long time while maintaining its reputation.

name: Wendigo
summary: A stealth horror game in the woods, investigate and progress while drawing as little attention to yourself as possible.

name: Weather Dominance
summary: 2D action platformer game where you don't play as the player but you play as the weather and you help the players to platform and save the environment from the eco-disasters

name: Welcome to Mars 9
summary: Welcome to Mars 9: The Tale of River is an old-school graphic adventure about a person adrift in space, rescued by a luxurious space station orbiting Mars. Playing as River, you will be drawn into a world of comfort and pleasure, only to soon discover that the station hides a dark secret.

name: Wexew Mexem
summary:
Wexew Mexem is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up by Japanese developer Zakichi. It takes inspiration from games like Exed Exes and Xexex.

By activating "High Point Mode" when your energy is at full power, you can also destroy enemy bullets, turning enemies into bonus items.
If you press the mode activation button during "high point mode", you will return to normal mode at any time.

Your attack has a range, and if you move up, the range will be longer, and if you move down, the range will be shorter, but the power will be doubled.

name: Welcome to Freddy's
summary: You, as the nightguard, must prevent someone from attempting to rob the building and prevent the animatronics from damaging valuable equipment in the night hours. For that, you have two specially designed doors at your sides. Prevent them from getting to your office by closing them, but watch out; don't run out of power, or Freddy and his merry band will get you.

name: We Kill Monsters
summary: We Kill Monsters is a solo or co-op adventure set in a mysterious and massive pit. You are a Husk of Edinu, homunculi created to explore the depths and hunt Angels.

name: West Ride
summary: Explore a mysterious world, conquer challenges in West Ride, an anime-inspired open-world driving game full of excitement and adventure.

name: We Are Not Alone
summary: We Are Not Alone is a new twist on horror that combines first person exploration and third person point and click adventure. As a member of a "safe" isolation experiment you'll explore an underground facility, solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of an unknown creature. Just don't make eye contact.

name: We Lost Our Human
summary: We Lost Our Human is an interactive comedy adventure about two indoor pets, a cat named Pud and a dog named Ham, who finds that all humans have seemingly disappeared from Earth.

name: We Carry the Fire
summary: We Carry the Fire is a fantasy-adventure visual novel about an apocalyptic curse, a magical forest, losing everything, and finding a reason to keep going.

name: We're All Dead Here
summary: These maps are all playable from pistol start and have non linear gameplay.

name: We Need To Talk
summary: Try to avoid the conversation! Use every move you got and every answer you can find to delay these - you assume - terrible news!

name: WestHalla
summary: A squad-based strategy RPG set in an alternate old west. Build your crew and manage their skills and equipment as you fight your way through bandits and beasts alike in a procedurally-generated valley to reach the promised land of WestHalla.

name: Welcome to Kowloon
summary: This is an indie horror from the first person, in which you find yourself in an area called Kowloon in search of cheap housing. The inhabitants of this place only at first glance seem to be ordinary people, but if we dig deeper, we will see their real faces.

name: We Need to Cook
summary: We need to cook! You are a drug-designing genius, living a bland existence in a middle-class neighborhood in Utah. You decide you want more out of life, so you buy a beat-up RV, drive it into the desert, and cook drugs. Make immense profits!

name: Webventure
summary: You and your friend will have work together to overcome challenges using your webs and creativity, helping each other and unraveling the mysteries of the forest.

name: We Are Gladiators
summary: We Are Gladiators is a challenging turn-based RPG roguelite game about commanding and managing a company of gladiators. Recruit, train and lead a roster of characters from all walks of life against ruthless outlaws, wild beasts, savage greenskins and undead monstrosities!

name: Welcome to My Cave
summary: Can you successfully manage a modern caveman tribe for 10 years? It’s time to prove yourself! Here’s your chance to lead a new caveman tribe and go even further in Welcome to My Cave, a tribe simulation game blending the conveniences of modern life with the Stone Age!

name: Weedcraft Inc & Moonshine Inc: Risky Business Bundle
summary: Start an illegal business and create an empire! Weed or moonshine - your choice!

name: Well, me neither
summary: Originally designed for a community project, Well, me Neither is a short Doom 2 adventure through a possibly flesh-infested neighbourhood. It didn't quite fill the project's rubric, but I still feel it scrapes by just enough to deserve a second lease on life.

name: We Escaped a Twisted Game
summary: Two players. One escape. Trapped in a haunted manor, you’ll need to talk, trust, and work together to make it out alive.

name: Web War
summary: A 3D vector graphics space shooter. To complete each sector of the Web you must initially destroy 20 aliens. The Web has 256 sectors to be cleared, and each will be marginally faster than the previous one.

name: Wendy Goes Walkies
summary: You are Wendy and you are trapped inside the mazes of Traag. To escape you have to collect all the foot boxes and get to the exit. There are four robots and a bird that will kill you if you touch them. The robots roam freely around the maze while the bird is flying up and down.

name: West Hunt: Halloween Pack
summary: Halloween DLC with scary Sheriff's monsters and more stuff

name: We Got Compagnie!
summary: Ready your bow, tune your magical violin, and liberate the musical prodigies mangled by a Corrupted Melody by playing your own melody. Prepare yourself, 'cause We Got Compagnie!

name: Web Sudoku
summary: To complete the Sudoku puzzle, enter numbers into the spaces so that each row, column and 3×3 box contains the digits 1 to 9 without repeats.

name: We Could Be Heroes
summary: We Could Be Heroes is a retro style, action packed beat ‘em up in the style of classic 90s brawler arcade titles. Featuring a huge array of attacks, destructible environments and brutal deaths. Become a hero and fight bad guys while stopping crimes and rescuing innocent civilians along the way.

name: Wedding Witch
summary: There is a witch here preparing to marry you. She embarks on an adventure to find the succubus's potion to seduce you. But a forest filled with demons stands in her way... Will she be able to find the succubus's potion and have a happy wedding?

name: WestQuest for Playdate!
summary: Crank (to jump) around to find out best way to collect the gold. Over 30 levels of crankin' action!

name: Welcome to the Game 2+
summary: Welcome to the Game 2+ is a mod for Welcome to the Game 2 that adds a ton of new websites, new enemies, new items, new modes, twitch integration and more.

name: We Were Here Expeditions: The FriendShip
summary: Partner up with your friend online and test your friendship by solving puzzles together in an abandoned amusement park. Work together to overcome brain-teasing challenges in this standalone We Were Here experience.

name: Welcome Teacher
summary: This is a horror RPG Maker MV game. Explore the quiet countryside shrouded in darkness, and uncover the hidden secret of terror that lies behind it.

name: Weedcraft Inc & Big Pharm Pharmacy Tycoon Bundle
summary: Make a better world with medicine in Weedcraft Inc and Big Pharma.

name: Welly Wang VR
summary: Use VR for what it was invented for, chucking things and hitting other things. Welly Wang VR is an eclectic mix of fair ground style challenges, mixed with off the wall random levels testing your skill and accuracy.

name: Wet Girls
summary: Wet Girls is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: We're Tethered Together
summary: Cast into an ancient crypt, survive the horrors that dwell below, and ascend from despair with your unexpected companion in this 2D puzzle platformer. Take risks to evade the petrifying gaze from beyond the dark.

name: Welcome, Get Out!
summary: "Welcome, Get Out!" is a puzzle game where the cranky narrator really doesn't like you being there. It is a Point&Click comedy adventure that will take you through 7 different hand-crafted levels against the wishes of the sarcastic narrator who is trying to stop you from succeeding.

name: Werner: Let's Go!
summary:
Werner: Let's go! is based on the German comics character Werner and offers five mini games:

Meiern is a dice game with an emphasis on bluffing. The basic rules: A player makes a hidden dice throw and checks the result. Then he gives the dice cup to the next player and says his result which may be true or a bluff (the said result needs to be higher than what the player before said). The next player either has the choice to throw the dice or to call a bluff. In the latter variant he opens up the dice cup and either the bluffer or the wrongful accuser gets a minus point.

A side-scrolling car drive in which the player has to avoid obstacles by accelerating or ducking.

Another car drive which is essentially the same with items which have to be picked up and used at the right time.

The fourth game is about building a motorcycle. The player needs to choose between a variety of parts. This game is lost after twelve incorrect guesses.

A motorcycle drive where the camera is directly placed behind the motorcycle. The goal is to avoid obstacles.

name: Weiss Schwarz Portable: 2nd Turn
summary: Weiss Schwarz Portable 2nd Turn is an expansion for Weiss Schwarz Portable that allows you to fight against some of the series characters. Each character's voice is used as the announcer. It uses the save data from the main Weiss Schwarz Portable games and has a challenge mode. Once you beat any character you can choose her for a single battle.

name: We'reWolves
summary: Dive into a thrilling dungeon-crawling adventure inspired by games like Vampire Survivors and Halls of Torment! Customize your character, choose your class, battle through diverse landscapes, and face an ever-growing horde of enemies as you build yourself up in this chaotic werewolf-themed game.

name: Welcome to IKSPQ
summary: Start map of the IKSPQ series.

name: Well of Lost Souls
summary: Small to medium-sized map inspired by E4M2- The Tower of Despair.

name: Wenl Mine
summary: Large mine cavern map; a remake of the third level from Descent 2. Exploration-style gameplay and many secrets.

name: Welcome Home
summary: Whome takes place in a nicely detailed industrial based city with plenty of explosions, neat sector tricks and solid urban gameplay.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers: Aim High Bundle
summary: Get two strategy games in a bundle! Weedcraft Inc + Terraformers

name: West of the Witchlands
summary: West of the Witchlands is a twin-stick shooter / roguelike about killing ancient gods with magic and revolvers.

name: Weapons Factory
summary: Quake II's spiritual successor to Team Fortress with jetpacks and grappling hooks; alternate classes, weapons and gadgets.

name: Weapons Factory Arena
summary: Remake of Weapons Factory on the Quake III engine.

name: Wet Dream
summary: 2-level mini episode, consisting of HighWire's "Wet Dream" and "Tropical Alien Massacre". Great design with Caribbean setting, featuring fitting custom art and challenging gameplay.

name: Welcome to Lightford
summary: Dive into Welcome to Lightford, a captivating mystery detective sim set in 1998. Unravel the town's secrets with unique solutions for each challenge, pushing your wits beyond the ordinary. Can you crack the mysteries and navigate the small town of Lightford?

name: Westwich Castle
summary: Westwich Castle is a short indie horror game, in which you are a prisoner and have to escape the horrors lurking inside this dark abandoned medieval castle.

name: West Hunt: Halloween Pack2
summary: Halloween 2 DLC with scary items

name: Wetcat
summary: Wetcat is about a curious little cat that got lost deep in the city's sewage system.

name: Western Redemption
summary: be a woman cowboy and try to find all treasures and main treasure to finish game and beware enemy cowboys in this western shooter parody

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 2
summary: The mystery continues in the highly anticipated sequel to Welcome to Primrose Lake!

name: Weekend Solitaire: Summer Village
summary: It's time to take on Solitaire Challenge. Pass the game's several stages. Conquer challenging card configurations and take on a big, vibrant game with several levels of varying difficulties. Overcome challenges, create combinations, and get bonuses.

name: Weapon Shop Decillionaire
summary: Weapon Shop Decillionaire is an idle game where weapons turn your dreams of wealth into reality. Build and sell equipment, use the profit to enhance it, while mastering strategic weapon placement on your shop's grid. It's time to become a decillionaire, one sword at a time!

name: Welcome to Paradize
summary: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: Weaponmancer
summary: Weaponmancer is an action roguelite where you, a unique mage, summon weapons to fend off diverse foes. Navigate bullet-riddled challenges, adapt with every run, and harness fallen enemies' essence to evolve and conquer.

name: We Need More Guns
summary: Team up in 'We Need More Guns,' a 4-player co-op wave shooter with procedurally generated weapons. Dive into the heart of chaos as you and your friends face relentless waves.

name: Weapon Party
summary: Weapon Party is a game that combines traditional Battle Royale with RPG, MOBA. Inspired by Vietnam.

name: Welcome to the Anime Club
summary: Welcome to the Anime Club is a parody mod for Doki Doki Literature Club. The mod features the MC and Monika, who have both had a falling out with each other, fighting over the future of the literature club.

name: Welcome To Eden
summary: Welcome To Eden is a narrative driven adventure RPG set in a utopian city, Eden. Take on quests to help your fellow residents, while learning about the more secretive side of Eden in this psychological adventure. And maybe, just maybe, everything isn't as it seems...

name: Western Slot Machine
summary: Feel lucky today! Now, you can play the best wild casino slot anywhere and anytime. Experience the real thrill of Las Vegas!Enjoy all the fun of a Western slot machine in your hand. Place your bet, spin, and win big prizes!

name: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0!
summary: Welcome to Planet E1d0r4d0! is a story-driven game about a young girl exploring the meaning of existence in a corner of the universe, including visual novel, simulation combined with side-scrolling adventure. In this chaotic and disorderly universe, even infinite lives seem so fragile.

name: Weird Meese
summary: An exploration game about photographing strange moose, wander through the last moose civilization and take pictures of it's inhabitants to help out moose and humans. As you photograph, you will discover the sinister plot lurking in the moose town.

name: Welcome to the Karoshi Club
summary: If you're nervous about job searching and interviews, face your fears head-on in "Welcome to the Karoshi Club" a Japanese horror business punk visual novel.

name: We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss
summary: We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss is a story game about mental health, all while using the beautiful tone of music, all while characters develop overtime. Players will be able to follow the journey of the main character, Frei Kay, and his mysterious power of his "music."

name: Weefager
summary: Guide this pink being with the power of the ether in a metroidvania where nothing is as it seems. Infuse souls into objects, create minions to help you, and explore vibrant landscapes with a great soundtrack. Shape your destiny on this captivating journey.

name: Wedge Lock Scaffolding VR Training
summary: In the VR simulator, the user will prepare the site, tools, construct three levels of the wedge scaffolding, control the horizontal level of the scaffolding parts, and mark the scaffolding as ready for use. The second member of the team will help with the task.

name: Webshooters
summary: Midway City is in a chaos! A new type of criminal needs a new style of justice... Battle for the streets as a hero or villain, on or offline, in screen space or VR!

name: WebCraft
summary: Webcraft is a claw machine mixed with open world crafting game in space. Catch resources floating by, craft and expand your base from a single square!

name: Weapon Meister
summary: Weapon Meister is a turn-based game focusing on fighting and combining combat moves. Numerous skills, several play modes and roguelike mechanics will make every adventure unique.

name: We Need More Steam!
summary: We Need More Steam! is about strategizing and creating as much electricity as possible for a town's people always demanding more!

name: Werewolves 3: Evolution's End
summary: In the wake of a horrific military raid on your woodland camp, the werewolf pack has become fractured and divided. When fate brings these disparate parties into contact once again, will your allies be able to put aside their differences long enough to survive the myriad dangers lying in wait?

name: Weapon Devourer
summary: Weapon Devourer is a psychological horror with souls-like and 1930's cartoon vibes, blending subtle puzzles. Battle sentient weapons, consume life forces, dive into the Shield's belly to synthesize might combinations in an ancient world shaped by a mysterious cyberpunk disaster...

name: We Are Infinity
summary:
A short game trying to mimic the gameplay and atmosphere of "This Is Infinity", a game by Cactusquid / Jonatan Söderström.

If you find yourself confused, the best thing to do is to stand still for a moment and let the view settle.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Moonshine Inc + Big Pharma: Chemistry Tycoons Bundle
summary: Get 3 tycoon games in one package! Weedcraft Inc + Moonshine Inc + Big Pharma

name: Weird RPG 2
summary: The sequel to the "Weird RPG" game. An action role-playing game focusing on boss battles. Players can use a series of special methods such as voice control and equipment hardware to strengthen their characters to fight. This will be a very wonderful adventure.

name: Weekend Romance
summary: Margaret is about to enjoy her weekend getaway with her girlfriend, Arabelle, when Arabelle decides to bring two unexpected guests to spice up their romantic life. What would Margaret do when three women want to be intimate with her? Play now!

name: Wet Cute Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: West Town Defense
summary: Gunslingers and bandits are storming the town! You must stop the crimes and rescue the town! This is a tough mission Sheriff, be careful. A classic, wave based survival game.

name: Welcome to Ukraine
summary: A puzzle game through which you will discover Ukraine.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Heliborne: Fly High Bundle
summary: Get behind the controls of a helicopter or build a weed empire -Weedcraft Inc + Heliborne

name: Weedcraft Inc + Legend of Keepers: Underworld Business Bundle
summary: Get two strategy games in one bundle: Weedcraft Inc and Legend of Keepers!

name: Weedcraft Inc + Legend of Keepers: Underworld Business Deluxe Bundle
summary: Get two strategy games in one bundle: Weedcraft Inc and Legend of Keepers!

name: We Are Sup
summary: Simple bra-fighting game that only uses addition! Dive into dungeons and defeat monsters in online play!

name: Weeny Wise
summary: Embark your adventure with your companion in Weeny Wise. Invite a friend to join you for free in the magical world of Weeny Wises with Friend’s Pass and continue the story of Anneli and Hugo.

name: Weird mister Bogot
summary: A computer game in the quest genre with a short plot and mysterious characters in the style of Russia in the early 90s.

name: Weird Colony
summary:
Weird Colony is an online multiplayer game which players will choose a race, then build a city, join a community, and wage a long term war against players of opposing races.

There are three races to choose from: Robot, Flan, and Scarecrow. Robots are the technological race (of course). Flans are the magical race, and Scarecrows are the dark race. Each race has their own unique structures and attacks. Robots specialize in combat against other players and against monsters. Flans specialize in monster growing and are strong against enemy bases. Scarecrows specialize in base defenses, such as powerful turrets and traps.

name: We are Football 2024
summary:
Welcome to We Are Foorball 2024 – the new football management experience from the creators of the legendary On the Ball and EA Sports FIFA Manager Series! Dive into the world of football like never before. Choose an existing club or start your own. Manage either men or women, lead your club to new heights, and become the following manager legend!

Be there with your team on the pitch. In our immersive 3D game engine, you can directly influence the action on the pitch through instructional shouts. Simulate the same game a thousand times over, witness matches 50 years into the future or switch between games in conference mode on match day. Relive highlights, analyze goals, and enjoy a comprehensive season summary.

name: Welcome to Paradize: Zombot Edition
summary: Paradise isn't exactly what you hoped for: it's infested with zombies! Thankfully, you can control them. Capture them and teach them to farm or fight. They will help you defend your camp while you explore the world looking for… a new paradise.

name: Weedcraft Inc + Ruinarch: Devil Lettuce Bundle
summary: Become an evil overlord or create a marihuana empire - Ruinarch + Weedcraft Inc

name: Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn: Weed and Greet Bundle
summary: Build your own weed empire or create a fantasy tavern - Weedcraft Inc + Crossroads Inn

name: Weapon Mix
summary: Buy weapons, flee from enemies and survive as long as possible. Improve your weapons to last longer

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Dark Fantasy Cosmetic Pack
summary: Dark Fantasy Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Holidays Cosmetic Pack
summary: Holidays Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Military Cosmetic Pack
summary: Military Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Phantasm Cosmetic Pack
summary: Phantasm Cosmetic Pack

name: Welcome to ParadiZe: Uniforms Cosmetic Pack
summary: Uniforms Cosmetic Pack

name: We Are The Mods
summary: An unreleased spiritual successor to The Warriors set in 1960s England during the mods and rockers brawls that was intended for the PlayStation 2 and later Xbox 360 before being scrapped entirely.

name: Wes Craven's Principles of Fear
summary: An unreleased game by Cyberdreams which was meant to release for Halloween in 1997 for the PC, and was based off a concept by horror movie director Wes Craven.

name: Weed Harvest
summary: Drive harvest machine in this simulation game where mission is to cut weed

name: Western Frontier
summary: An action shooter in which Billy, an assassin, fights in the frontier days of the West!

name: We Were Monkeys
summary: Trying to escape the lab with your monkey pal, your realize the experimentations made you two see things differently. Can the two of you find your way out in time ?

name: Weedcraft Inc + Bio Inc. Redemption: Medical Herbs Bundle
summary: Explore medical influence of weed and cure patients!

name: We Suspect Foul Play
summary:
Hollywood, a land of dreams!

But this dream has turned into a nightmare, with the assassination of famous actress Mary Helen in her villa in the middle of the night.

You are tasked to search the scene, find clues, and reconstruct what has happened!

name: Weezer: End of the Game Game
summary:
So here’s the deal… we made a game and it’s super hard to beat. It’s the final boss level. The End of the Game Game. Get it?
If you’re bored at home and ran out of what to watch on Netflix, we got you.
Good luck trying to win this thing.

name: Welcome to Paradize: Archeology Quest
summary: Archaeologist Quest Set

name: Wedding Peach
summary: A PC98 game based on the anime Wedding Peach.

name: Welcome to Silverscale Lake!
summary: A small-town mystery set in a "mundanely magical" modern-day/very near future world with science-fantasy elements, taking place over the course of 9 days. Figure out the truth behind the tragic disaster that shut down the magi-tech factory 20 years ago.

name: We Need Space
summary: A romantic comedy visual novel with a sci-fi tilt. If you've ever wanted to blast someone into space, this may very well be for you.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names: Wardens and Furies
summary: Wardens and Furies unlocks the options to play as a member of the Black Fury tribe or the Hart Warden tribe, as well as adding new Gifts for the tribes.

name: Wealth Project
summary: Practice mindfulness! Divide assets and liabilities! Calculate your net worth and how much time it takes to reach your dreams! Set a clear vision and goals to create your own wealth project!

name: Weekend Hentai
summary: Are you ready to unleash your charm and embark on a thrilling weekend filled with passion, excitement, and unforgettable moments? Get ready to experience "Weekend Hentai" and discover where your desires will lead you!

name: We're Closed Sorry
summary:
We're closed Sorry is a metroidvania in which the player controls both a titular hero traversing the interior of a retro supermarket store and the owner of the store. Immerse in an action-adventure combating bugs, finding secrets, and becoming a dreamt hero.

As the owner of the store, the game only begins when you close your shop allowing all creepy things and bugs to lurk in the dark terrorizing the store and your products.

name: Welcome to Bulletheck
summary:
Welcome To BulletHeck is a small rougelike game focused on randomized items and conserving energy. Energy is consumed by both shooting and sprinting and running out will cause the player to slow down for a short time. New guns and items can be discovered as you progress as well as stat upgrades that can be bought from shops.

The only objective is to reach floor 10 and fight the boss.

name: Welcome to the Yokai Inn
summary: A quest to save your father whisks you away to the doorstep of Sankiya Inn, the most famous ryokan in the yokai world. There, you broker a deal with the handsome oni owner to work in exchange for room and board, and soon find yourself training under a friendly bakeneko coworker and mingling with otherworldly guests, including a mysterious ronin…

name: We Are Only Moving Towards Each Other
summary: A concrete poem in the browser, a love story, and a dream sequence traversed through closing and opening windows.

name: We Are Stardust
summary: Space Invaders. Wrapped in a circle. And Mavis Beacon playing it.

name: We are Monsters
summary: Embark on an epic journey through the realms of fantasy as you summon mighty armies of mythical creatures, valiant heroes, and formidable spellcasters.

name: Weekend in Waimanalo
summary: Weekend in Waimanalo is a romantic comedy yuri visual novel and dating sim. This is a game about love, respect, friendship, self-exploration, and mental health. Explore this hidden side of Oahu, get to know interesting characters, and see how your decisions affect where Rachel ends up and with who!

name: Werewolf Party
summary: Test your deception skills in this thrilling first-person multiplayer game. Play with 4-11 people, taking on diverse roles—from a cunning werewolf to an observant villager, each equipped with unique powers. Pay attention to detail, listen for vocal cues, and use your perception to win.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Purgatory
summary: A choice-driven RPG thriller set in the World of Darkness universe. Step into the shoes of Samira, a young werewolf refugee in Poland, as she battles dark forces and loneliness, caught between rage and despair. How will your story unfold?

name: We Heist Too
summary: Welcome to the city of Rywadorium! Explore the unique regions of the city and pretend you're a regular citizen with no illegal intentions. Enter people's homes without permission and immerse yourself into a role of a thief in a unique setting of atomic 1960s fiction, at this regular day at 'work'.

name: Welcome to Everdell
summary: Build your perfect make-believe city in the digital adaptation of the beloved family-friendly board game!

name: Welcome Back, Commander
summary: Commander, your strike team is to dive deep into the contaminated city of Sun Stone and get some answers before the mysterious deadly plague spreads beyond the city limits. Good luck Commander!

name: We Live Inside A Dream
summary:
We are like the dreamer who dreams, and then lives inside the dream...but who is the dreamer?

We Live Inside a Dream is a first person interactive experience combining elements of the FPS, horror, puzzle, driving and stealth genres. Experience the uncanny town of Snoqualmie: The Hotel, Double R Diner, The Sheriffs Department, The Convenience Store, The Red Room and much more.

Uncover the mystery of the missing Deputy and answer the question of...who is the dreamer?...but be cautious as the road may not even lead you there...

name: Welcome Home
summary: Welcome Home is a bone-chilling horror walking simulator that plunges you into a world of terror and intrigue. Set in a decrepit and sinister house that you have just purchased, this game will test your courage as you navigate through the eerie halls of your new home.

name: We Are Saved
summary: "We Are Saved" is a short, free, first-person horror game. You are trapped alone in an underground factory rumored to be a site of cat abuse. While being pursued by the deranged inhabitant of the abandoned factory, your mission is to rescue the pitiful cats and aim for escape.

name: Wet-Dry World
summary: A map loosely based on Wet-Dry World from Super Mario 64.

name: West Alien Train
summary: Duke must find an alien semi-organic train that is heading west and wipe all those aliens before they trash the next city

name: Werewolf Goldfish
summary:
Which goldfish is the Werewolf?
Find and scoop up the Werewolf Goldfish hiding in plain sight!

name: We got bored lol
summary: Six small ~2-hour speedmaps + a start hub, all following different themes and based on the Copper mod (included). It comes with a custom music track.

name: Weekdays
summary: Black-and-White Style: Immerse yourself in a unique atmosphere where light and shadow play a crucial role.Variety of Locations: Explore strange corridors with rooms, a forest with a witch's hut, an old cemetery, an abandoned house on a wasteland, and more.

name: Weed Shop 4: Highland
summary: VISIT HIGHLAND! Smoke the hottest strains, have them roll your blunts and pack your bowls. After grinding it out in Sunless Beach for over 3 years you deserve a vacation, so get toasty and enjoy your 420 TRIP!

name: Welcome to Dustown
summary: Welcome to Dustown is a 4-player cooperative horror game. Play as field scientists exploring vast fields of labyrinthine corn, collecting samples and evidence on behalf of a mysterious corporation. Just make sure you don't get killed at the crossroads.

name: We'll Be Alright
summary: Jonghyun, a strange cafe owner, runs the Zodiac Cafe with a side business in the back. He tells fortunes from reading tea leaves for curious customers- who lean more supernatural than not. Even mythological entities want to know how their life will pan out!

name: WeFly
summary: WeFly was a flight simulator for the Wii, which was originally pitched as a PilotWings game however was rejected by Nintendo and later reworked into a new IP before being cancelled. The game was going to be an open-world game which was going to allow the player to fly around the globe and visit various famous cities on Earth. The game was also going to use the Wii's Forecast Channel to accurately simulate the weather and time of day in the real world locations.

name: Weedy's World
summary: Weedy's World is a one or two-player game set in a U.P. Michigan dispensary called Glazed & Confused, players navigate a cannabis maze as Weedy or Ms. Weedy, collecting pot leaves and using power-ups while avoiding aliens. Inspired by Pac-Man, the game adds a unique twist with 420-themed humor.

name: Websling
summary: Websling is an action roguelike game about swinging, battling bugs and collecting powerful items. Bouncing between the past and the future, players take control of a small jumping spider who must use their webs to defeat powerful foes from across time and space.

name: Wedding Day
summary: As I reached adulthood, a village bully murdered me and abandoned my body in a temple. My fearful parents didn't seek revenge but, worried about my wandering spirit, arranged a ghostly marriage. This allowed me to rest peacefully in a suitor's ancestral tomb.

name: Western Death
summary: Western Death is a 2D roguelike set in the Wild West, combining RPG and fantasy elements.

name: We Are Not Alone: Contact
summary: "We Are Not Alone - Contact" is a reimagining of the first game. Inspired by alien horror films from the 80s, bringing comical horror and at the same time scary and bloody.

name: We Harvest Shadows
summary: A first-person farming horror allegory. Become a recluse, build up your farm, and survive the lonely nights.

name: Weeb
summary: Weeb is a Anime Clicker game where you will gather new friends to your collection.

name: Weird O's: Chaos Royale
summary: Dive, dodge, and dash your way to victory in the wildest fantasy brawl! Weird O's: Chaos Royale is a 3D platforming battle royale like no other, blending hilarious co-op exploration with chaotic free-for-alls. Team up to gather crystals, unleash your animal spirit and conquer wacky obstacle courses.

name: Wer weiß denn sowas?: Das 3. Spiel
summary: Just in time for the 11th season, Elton, Bernhard Hoëcker and Kai Pflaume are back on the PC with a brand new edition of WER WEISS DENN SOWAS?

name: Welcome to Doll Town
summary: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.

name: Wer Wird Millionär?
summary: Wer wird millionär? is a German DVD game based on the TV show Wer wird millionär?, which is the German localization of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.

name: Werewolves Revenge
summary: Werewolves Revenge is a social deduction game where your voice is your greatest weapon. Played by up to 16 Players, games are filled with deceit, murder and twists.

name: Welcome to Sushi Tree
summary: A fast paced game inspired by Wario land 4 and pizza tower that puts a lot of focus on story and uniqueness of each level.

name: We Grew Up in War
summary: Discover the stories of kids growing up in the midst of armed conflicts over the last three decades. Inspired by real testimonies, this narrative adventure follows the lives of children from Bosnia, Syria, and Ukraine.

name: Webkinz Jr.
summary: Webkinz Jr. was the preschool counterpart of Webkinz. It was intended to be a more educational site for a younger audience of children aged 3-6. The site launched in April 2009 and was ultimately shut down some time in 2018.

name: Weatherman
summary: Weatherman is a fast thinking puzzle simulation game where you rapidly assess gadgets to predict the weather. Your reports save lives.

name: Well to Hell
summary: A short first-person horror game where you play as an urban explorer trapped at the bottom of a well. Find a way out before it finds you.

name: We Happy Restaurant
summary:
Welcome to We Happy Restaurant Mega Group Inc.. Here you will have an opportunity to run your own restaurant and be a productive, profitable member of the corporate family.

Our mega group's killer product, green essence, is the foundation of our immensely profitable restaurant business. It keeps our customers hungry and always wanting more! With such an incredible weapon at hand, we can save ourselves from the dull effort of improving the food, and really really focus on the difficult part that is not doing anything! Too good to be true? Join us now, and find out for yourself!

name: Webfishing
summary: Webfishing is a multiplayer chatroom-focused fishing game! Relax and fish (on the web!)

name: Welcome to Elderfield
summary: Welcome to Elderfield is a spooky farming RPG. You can farm, fish, mine, cook, craft, befriend townsfolk, beseech the old gods, investigate mysteries, watch unsettling news programs, get lost in the dead mall, die in your sleep and more. There's lots to do in Elderfield!

name: Welcome to Ela
summary: Welcome to Ela is an active-time battle RPG in which you explore the wicked city of Ela, a place filled with the horrors of the common life. Prepare yourself to face the threats awaiting in your journey, gather resources, unlock new abilities and escape this hopeless place before it's too late.

name: Weldiver
summary:
Each mission in Weldiver is a journey into the ocean’s depths, where players undertake the challenging work of maintaining offshore structures, performing emergency repairs, and replacing seabed infrastructure like optical cables, pipelines, and power lines.

Forty times more likely to die than the average worker... and every time I go down, the pressure waits. Trying to make me implode, drown, freeze... or worse.

name: Werner Waffenwerke: Arms Tycoon
summary: Take on the role of a weapons manufacturer and lead your company to fame and fortune. Develop weapons and sell what you can!

name: Westild's Law
summary: Westild's Law offers shootouts where you must use every element of your arsenal to win. Throw dynamite or your weapon at your enemies to stun them when ammo runs low and then take their weapons. When the situation gets critical, activate "ultra-sense", slow-down time and enhance your abilities. Embark on adventures through 48 levels, each offering unique challenges.

name: Westbound: Perils Ranch
summary: Explore the lush woods and western mud bay in this Cowboys ranch town. Challenge yourself and build your own Cowboys township, city or village by clearing out a blissful obstacles and debris. Venture into this western island and create your own vivid bay. Have fun in this western farm simulation game.

name: Weird Pizza Dreams
summary: What happens when you eat some weird pizza before going to bed? You have WEIRD PIZZA DREAMS! It's short and maybe not too difficult but I hope you have fun playing it. This was made for LSDJam 2023.

name: Weird Wormholes
summary: Weird Wormholes is a casual game about traveling through wormholes to try and get back home. Use your ship to mine planets for resources and process these resources into components to enable your travels.

name: Weaveborn Heroes
summary: Survive relentless waves and take on powerful bosses every 5 levels! Weaveborn Heroes is a roguelike arena game where each victory brings you closer to becoming unstoppable. Level up, choose from unique spells and passive abilities, and build your hero to beat the final boss!

name: Wegi
summary: Gather around the wegi board with a group of friends on a stormy Halloween night in the late 1980s. What begins as a harmless game soon spirals into a dark, twisted tale of grief, betrayal, and deception. Wegi invites you to experience a short story-driven adventure to uncover secrets with the group and find out what happened to Sarah the night she died.

name: Weapons of War
summary: Weapons of War is a free 3D fantasy MMORPG set in an ancient mythical world, featuring five classes, quests, PvP and PvE environments, and ongoing in-game events

name: Weirdo
summary: Weirdo is a Japanese manga-style visual novel set in DYL High School. It follows Wang Zhe, an ordinary and frail boy, who tries to win the hearts of girls and complete his experiments. He gets entangled in bizarre events, plunging into darkness. Each choice you make determines his fate.

name: We Three Gifts
summary: We Three Gifts is a single MBF21 map for Doom 2 (MAP01) made by Dreadopp and Lord_ Z utilizing the 32in24-15 texture pack and some of Doom Christmas: Enhanced's resources.

name: Weed Lord Simulator
summary: Grow, trim, and sell your way to becoming the ultimate cannabis kingpin. Expand your empire, hire dealers, and dominate the underground market!

name: Weed Simulator
summary: Don't smoke weed. Become weed!

name: Welcome Home
summary: Where home feels wrong, and you’re anything but welcome.

name: We Are Alive
summary: We Are Alive is a Co-Op horror game, that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. You are a detective and your mission is to investigate the old psychiatric hospital and find out the truth. Your standard equipment is a flashlight and a gun.

name: Welcome to the Universe
summary: Welcome to the Universe is a game about dots. Trust the process.

name: Well Dumb
summary: It's a simple swiping game. You catch fish from a well. Trade fish with other players. Regular updates and fish drop events! Happy Fishing!

name: Wendigo Blue
summary: Action-packed 2D beat-em-up with intense boss battles and a large variety of customizable equipment and skills. Up to 4 players with local co-op.

name: Wekele Wordle
summary:
Worde, the addictive word-guessing game that challenges your vocabulary and deduction skills in just six attempts. Can you crack the code and find the hidden word?

Guess the daily word in 6 tries, practice with unlimited words or create your own Worde! Now with 5 levels: 4, 5, 6, 7 & 8 letter words!

name: Welcome to Maison Chichigami
summary: Deep in the mountains, there is said to be a legendary hot spring: called the Spirit Spring. Becoming lost on the way to the spring, you are rescued by a mysterious, reclusive family. But what secrets does this family hide away in their manor?

name: Werewolf Hunter: Survive the Howl
summary: Terror awaits in the shadows. Will you survive?

name: Welcome Googoo
summary: A game where you write party invitations using a selection of words and stickers.

name: Webstore Mogul
summary: Rise to become a webstore mogul by managing your own online shop. Set prices for your products, manage inventory, hire employees, and design your online store. With strategic decisions and effective management, you will build a successful online business.

name: Welcome to Paradise Island
summary: While on vacation with your friends, you are suddenly washed away to a mysterious island in another world. Now you must befriend the locals, gather resources, and build Paradisiem Island into a bustling tourist destination so that you may go home!

name: Wet
summary: Play Wet, a calm puzzle game. Move land to guide water through 32 fun puzzles. Think smart and solve each task in a world of peace and ease. Simple to play, hard to master, and made to soothe your mind.

name: WE Turkey 8
summary: WE Turkey 8 is a modification for Winning Eleven 8 (PS2).

name: We Are Soccer
summary: Join the soccer craze and become part of the ultimate hangout experience with endless possibilities.

name: West Escape
summary: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the wildest ride through the Wild West!

name: Wet Whispers: Anime Shift Puzzles
summary: Solve captivating anime puzzles with Wet Whispers – Anime Shift Puzzles, where every piece unlocks beautiful, moody art!

name: Welkin Melody
summary: "Welkin Melody" blends flight shooting with rhythm gameplay, featuring bold design innovations. Players sync attacks with the music for a unique experience. The game offers various weapons for customizable strategies and an equipment system with rich customization options.

name: Wednesdays
summary: "The hardest part is not to speak up. It’s being heard." Part video game, part graphic novel, Wednesdays seeks to raise awareness about child sexual abuse through a surprisingly uplifting story.

name: WeightWare
summary: A game that contains multiple different weird minigames to complete.

name: West Escape: Complete Edition
summary: Outrun the law, blast aliens, and fight for love in the Wild West!

name: We Bowling?!
summary:
WeBowling?! is built from the ground up for Speedrunners. In this game you take control of a bowling ball of your choosing and make your way through the obstacles in the fastest amount of time.

Each of the 5 current levels (more to come) contains its own steam leaderboard so you have 5 chances to get the WR.

With force sensitivity options and ball selection, you have all the means necessary to tailor the game to your exact specifications!

Obstacles range from mini-golf esque obstacles like windmills and spinners to more mundane ones like.... a rock!

Do you have what it takes to bowl a strike?? Let's find out....

I only have one question for you....

We Bowling?!

name: Weird Little Guys
summary: One afternoon, your cat requests a treat...

name: Welcome to: Doki Doki Literature Club, Player!
summary:
Welcome to Doki Doki Literature Club, Player! is a unique mod that breaks the fourth wall even further and transforms the original Doki Doki Literature Club! experience into something even more immersive and interactive.

In this mod, you're not just a player controlling the protagonist-you're recognized as an individual within the game universe itself. The members of the Literature Club, Sayori, Natsuki, Yuri and Monika, interact directly with you, reacting to your choices in unexpected ways and even questioning your presence in their world.

name: Weaponry (Experimental)
summary: A fast-paced 1v1 randomized FPS game.

name: Westard
summary: Get ready to heist banks and rob trains solo or co-op with friends in Westard VR. Take it to the western streets to decide who controls the town in pvp multiplayer modes.

name: Welcome to the Ungdung Cafe
summary: Once a teacher, Choon-sam Choi attends a reunion at Dongil High School, where he worked as a teacher. There, he hears the news about Lee Jin-woo, a student he especially cared about, and he runs a hip cafe because he meets Jin-woo through an accidental opportunity...

name: Welcome to the Chop House
summary: Sneak, create distractions, use parkour and solve puzzles to escape this First-Person survival horror slaughterhouse. Trapped in a factory farm for humans you must survive being hunted by your captors.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 4
summary: Welcome to Primrose Lake, the charming Rocky Mountain town that's captivated folks around the world! If you're a fan of the previous games in the series, you're in for a real treat with the fourth installment of the fan-favorite Time Management game created by SQRT3.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 3
summary: Enjoy Primrose Lake 3 in its classic Time Management game takes you down the twisty lane of mysteries, murders, and romances.

name: Welcome to Primrose Lake 5
summary: Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of Primrose Lake and embark on the final journey of the Welcome to Primrose Lake series by SQRT? Brace yourself for a nail-biting and action-packed conclusion that will leave you spellbound!

name: Wet Passion
summary: A relaxing puzzle game with 100+ levels that will give you a good mood.

name: Wet Girls
summary: WET GIRLS - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: West Journey
summary: "West Journey" is an action-adventure game brimming with mystery and challenge, transporting players into an ancient world rich with legend. Here, along the ancient west wind trail, history stretches back eons, concealing countless undiscovered secrets and treasures.

name: Welcome to Bunny Farm
summary: Welcome to Bunny Farm is a tomato clock function idle game where you only need to click the 'Start Working' button and wait, as Bunny, your trusty employee, will take care of the farm for you. Other small animals may drop by for a visit; you can greet them, and who knows?

name: WebCum Secrets
summary: Ever wondered what it’s like to manage a webcam business? Find out in WebCum Secrets - a hot visual novel about a model manager. Save your career, build relationships and shape everyone’s future with your decisions!

name: Webcam Love
summary: WEBCAM LOVE - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: We are Blob
summary: Hello! Hey! Yeah, you! The one behind the computer! Welcome to We are Blob, a chill and cozy point-and-click game that follows our main hero...BLOB! Help Blob navigate their new job as a game developer while trying not to get fired. You only have ONE week to finish this game so...no pressure!

name: Weapon Rearing
summary: Idle weapon collection and weapon development game. Legendary weapons can be automatically obtained.

name: Welcome! Uninvited Guest
summary:
A short and mildly difficult one shot type horror game I made in two weeks to try and get my game dev groove going after a month long hiatus. Was a bit experimental with this one. While the game may be a bit difficult to play due to it's heavy emphasis on hiding and not getting caught, I do hope people will enjoy the learning curve and have some fun with it!

You must scour the forest in search of gears to unlock the ritual doors. Activate powerful statues, hide wherever you can and most importantly, do NOT let them see you... Once all four of the Formless Statues have been activated, the ritual will be complete. This won't be a simple task. You must use your wit and resourcefulness to hide and evade the Uninvited whilst you explore the forest.

The map randomly generates every time you play, making each run feel a little different from the last. But your objective remains the same, complete the ritual.

name: Welcome to Brightville
summary: 'Welcome to Brightville' is an action-adventure immersive sim in which you play as a unique automaton guardian. You will explore the mysterious city of Brightville, where magic and steampunk technology collide!

name: Weed Drug Empire
summary: Step into the shadows of a world where power is taken, not given. In this underground simulator, you're building more than a business—you're creating an empire from nothing. No cash, no allies—just ambition, strategy, and the will to rise. Every move matters. Every mistake leaves a mark.

name: Weird Cat
summary:
Start living a life of friendship with cute cats in your own space.

-Meet the various cats that are pretty and spend together. Release your favorite cats and give water and clean the toilet. And whenever you can touch it, please start with healed experience.

-Please purchase a furniture item that stimulates the decorative instincts. Make your own space, and be sure to have fun with cats.

name: Wendigo's Outside
summary: Survive Wendigo and any other challenges that await you later in the adventure!

name: We Three: A Love Story
summary: A love triangle where romance and obsession mingle in a story of desire, manipulation and unexpected twists and turns.

name: We Will Be Gods
summary: We Will Be Gods is a free-to-play strategy war game on a massive scale. Large kingdoms of players must work together to face-off against other player-owned kingdoms, battling it out in massive, months-long wars in a bid to attain godhood and ultimate victory.

name: Werthit
summary:
You lost a bet and now have to stay the night at the Hide residence, an old Guesthouse with a dark history. But something is amiss here...

Explore a large haunted Japanese guesthouse, where the house itself will do it's best to impede your progress, possessing objects to stun you and scare you.

Four difficulties to choose from, with two endings to discover. Will you run away as soon as the opportunity arises, or will you try to exorcise the house? You may even experience an extension to the story in Nightmare Mode...

name: Westfall
summary: Westfall is a cooperative/collaborative horror game where you collect precious stones from cursed towns of the wild west.

name: We Thieves HD
summary: We Thieves is a cartoon styled physics puzzle game suitable for all ages, combining realistic game physics,tricky levels,and funny animations.

name: Weaphones Firearms Sim Mini
summary:
Welcome to the world of Weaphones, the ultimate firearms simulator for your iPhone, iPod and iPad.

Blurring the line between digital and physical, Weaphones combines the two to create a fully interactive real world experience. Switch off the safety, load the magazine, rack the slide and fire, all without having the cops called on you.

Ergonomically designed, Weaphones fit naturally into the shooter’s hand. All the important controls are located within a finger’s reach. The ability to resize, flip, zoom and relocate the Weaphone assures perfect fit no matter the size of hand or screen.

name: Weed Shop Simulator
summary: Weed Shop Simulator launches in Early Access! Build your cannabis empire from seed to sale. Grow rare strains, craft legendary products, hire your team, and outsmart rivals in a chaotic world full of wild adventures and deep cannabis culture. Your empire awaits!

name: Welcome To The Backrooms
summary: There must be an exit somewhere. Keep your wits about you as you traverse a seemingly endless labyrinth of dingy yellow walls and moldy carpet. Find candy bars and almond water to keep your strength, and stay out of the shadows to keep your sanity.

name: Well of Darkness
summary: Well of Darkness is action medieval, dark-fantasy role-playing game. Escape the imprisonment to reach the surface from Raydow giant caves. Fight your way through monsters and mutations with self-made weapons and guts.

name: Wet City
summary: Welcome to Wet City the city of sin and opportunity, where you rise as an adult film producer. Meet the hottest girls, uncover their secrets, and build your very own entertainment empire. Money, romance, dangerit's all waiting for you!

name: Welcome, Sharehouse!
summary: Living in a share house with three pretty girls

name: Weed & Greed
summary:
Dive into the bustling world of Weed & Greed, where you'll build your illicit empire from the ground up!

Find clients or hire dealers to keep your business thriving and establish a loyal customer base. But be ready for intense action: battle NPCs and cops, arm yourself, and rule the streets like a true boss.

Explore a dynamic city with day-night cycles and shady corners perfect for deals. Build your empire by cultivating plants, synthesizing pills, and upgrading your equipment.

Rent labs, warehouses, and stash houses to dominate the game!

name: Wet Slits
summary: Wet Slits is an exciting animated game with many different sexual scenarios. You need to control the sex toys or the girls to help them achieve orgasm and squirt. A game with beautiful graphics can be very addictive!

name: We Are Busy Digging a Hole
summary: A relaxing cooperative digging adventure where you explore colorful underground worlds with friends. Team up to dig deeper, find valuable ores, upgrade your equipment, and collect rare dragons together.

name: We Have To Let You Go
summary: We Have To Let You Go is a puzzle RPG game created from the ground up using the RPG Maker engine. Players will traverse several vibrant worlds interconnected by an engrossing character-driven storyline, and a strategic battle system.

name: We Are Locked
summary: -Hide from vengeful ghosts, search for the key, and escape the haunted house before it's too late. Stay quiet, stay hidden, and survive.

name: Well, Fuck You Too
summary: A short interactive fiction about Internet discourse.

name: WeirdParisGame
summary: a very short game I made for my university, they didn't like it that much

name: Welcome to Greedcorp
summary: A Retro dating-sim roguelite set in a corporate hellscape! Sign the contract and consider your life sold to GREEDCORP. How will your career go? Fired and on the brink of homelessness, GREEDCORP becomes your LAST HOPE. As you navigate the corporate jungle, An enterprise straight from the fourth circle of hell, maybe get romantical with a few babes. Or will you put your distractions aside and face the challenge of climbing the corporate ladder?

name: We Hunt Them in the Dark
summary: A hand-drawn "anomaly hunter" game with a playtime of 10 to 30 minutes.

name: Weapons Arena
summary: "Beyond seven steps, the gun is faster than the sword; within seven steps, the gun is both faster and more accurate." But... what happens if you're surrounded by a group of swords? Can the gun still hold its edge?

name: Westale: Peelgrimage
summary: Westale: Peelgrimage is an ink-style survivor-like game. Player can evolve their characters in the game, use marvelous magical treasures, experience the mysterious 72 transformations, and synthesize artifacts. Let's get into this Journey-to-the-West world and experience addictive combat.

name: Welcome to Camp Blue Lake
summary: You fight with the voices in your head that keep telling you to hurt people. Can you stop it?

name: We Interns
summary: Top-down office themed roguelite. Fight off your annoying coworkers as one of many young interns and unlock different playable characters, permanent items and office spaces to fight in.

name: WEGO World War II: Stalingrad
summary: WEGO World War II: Stalingrad is a hex-based wargame depicting the German offensive to seize Stalingrad in 1942. With historical scenarios and dynamic campaigns, players command forces in one of WWII’s most pivotal battles.

name: Wega & The Lost Media
summary:
Wega And The Lost Media is an in development shitpost 2D Platformer that follows the iconic Luigi and Mario recolors Wega and Urio, and their quest to stop the evil Maltigi from making their world LOST MEDIA!

The game will contain 8 worlds of content, 4 weapons for you to break out of bounds with, a soundtrack that's probably better than this game deserves, and shoe bench.

name: Wednesday Night
summary: It's a Wednesday night. You put on your mask and step outside. You already know where you're headed.

name: Weeping Cherries
summary: Among blossoming cherry trees sit two boys bound by a heart-wrenching promise. How will they spend their last day together now that it's time to fulfill it?

name: We Love Mind Control Rocket
summary: You control one of five gifted siblings, and your goal in the game is to eliminate the other four so that you can take over the world. You do this by building up mighty robot armies and fighting them in RPG-style battles. At the start of the game, you hold a 5% share in each of the seven country's resources. To get the resources to build up your army and take out your siblings, you need to buy more shares in each country and use your resources to create oil, metal, plastics and machine parts, which you use to build troops.

name: We Who Rise
summary: A fast-paced vertical arcade platformer where you, a brave knight, climb an endless tower packed with tricky traps. Leap over spikes, dodge spears, outmaneuver blades and saws, stay ahead of danger, and chase your high score in a light-hearted but thrilling test of reflexes and timing.

name: Wettop
summary: WETTOP is a challenging first-person parkour adventure where every jump counts. With only 10 lives, your goal is to climb to the top of a towering world filled with thrilling jumps, moving platforms, and surprising tasks. Miss a jump, and you fall—lose a life. Lose them all? It's game over.

name: Well Dweller
summary: Well Dweller is a dark fairy-tale metroidvania full of charming characters living in a wretched kingdom. Play as Glimmer- a tiny bird armed with a matchstick- who must burn the wicked queen to save his family.

name: Westview Academy
summary: A talented young man joins "Westview Academy", one of the nation's best schools, known for its spectacular sports facilities and its music program. At Westview Academy, he'll make tough decisions and have unique experiences surrounded by many new friends and different environments. Live your dreams as a college athlete or climb your way to the top as a superstar musician! How will your story go?

name: We Have Doom at Home
Websy and the Time Rogues
summary: Websy and the Time Rogues is an action roguelike game about a spider using webs to swing through levels and string together enemies for combo attacks. The game centres around Websy, a small jumping spider who gets pulled out of time and recruited by the mysterious Time Rogues, an organization which fights evil enemies invading the past, present and future. Websy and their new allies must use their unique abilities to defend time and space by defeating enemy incursions and closing the time portals.

name: We Build Below
summary: A roguelike, co-op factory builder that is set on an alien planet. You're part of an rag-tag mining team trying to get rich. Meet the daily quota to keep your mining permit and defend against dangerous parasites to stay alive.

name: We Don't Cry: Zombie Survival
summary: Survive waves of zombies and raiders in this action-packed survival horror shooter. Defend, build, scavenge, and adapt in a post-apocalyptic world where every choice matters.

name: Weather Report
summary: A brief RPG Maker horror game. A young researcher burns the midnight oil, with the nightly weather report as his only company. Two endings, some surprises.

name: Welcome Home, Sweetie
summary: Experience a gruesome adventure in monochrome 4-color pixel art. Exit the castle and figure out what happened by investigating objects and fighting enemies - remember, you only have one life.

name: We Need an Army
summary: We Need An Army is a fantasy roguelike grid based deck builder about recruiting a powerful army! Recruit units, match patterns, and upgrade your grid in this tactical roguelike slots-based deckbuilder.

name: Western Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: We Need To Go Deeper: Complete Edition
Well Keeper
summary: Well Keeper is a Bullet Hell Shoot `Em Up where you move by flapping. Battle waves of enemies, upgrade unique and unexpected abilities and become immensely powerful.

name: Welcome
summary: WELCOME is a hardcore survival game that will be in a newer version with a bit of battleroyale style, where the task of the players is to survive on the map and wisely use sprint for stamina. Search for things to survive like food and drink, craft trees, stones and shrubs to extract the necessary resources to build a base where he can...

name: Welcome to Chirpvenience
summary: In Welcome to Chirpvenience!, take on a short-term part-time job at a small-town convenience store and spend a week in Lark Town. Through a first-person perspective, experience cozy, humorous, and surprising everyday life!

name: Welcome to the Dungeon
summary: Place monsters and objects directly on a grid-based dungeon. Watch as heroes travel along the paths, interacting with the objects and events you’ve set up, and see if they grow according to your plan. Train them into stronger heroes and guide them to reach their ultimate destination!

name: We, Junk Artists
summary: A "collage-and-guess" multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Enjoy collaging ordinary items into outside-the-box "masterpieces," guess each other's creations, and unleash your wild imagination around the campfire. Here, everyone is an artist!

name: Wet and Wild
summary: In Wet and Wild Girls, your goal is simple yet irresistible, unlock and collect stunningly beautiful girls, each captured naked, wet, and glistening under the steamy shower. With 300 breathtaking girls waiting to be discovered, every level brings you closer to completing your ultimate collection!

name: Weapon Case
summary: A top-down roguelite shooter where you command a ship and survive endless waves of sea monsters. Manually aim your main weapon, auto-fire the rest, and upgrade to stay afloat, or sink trying.

name: Wetter
summary: Explore a remote, rain-drenched archipelago. Find cozy shelters and cherish long-lost memories to see life in a new light. What will you make of your past?

name: We Are Square
summary: WARNING: This game will destroy friendships. In We Are Square you and up to seven friends must work together to control one square and platform yourselves to the goal.

name: Weeks Till Winter
summary: In a dark study with a Book of Worlds and a handful of wooden buildings, you are cursed to build until you've unlocked the secrets of your mysterious past. This is a score-based strategy game using city-builder mechanics.

name: Web Fishing: Relax and Fish
summary: Cast your line and enjoy peaceful fishing adventures.

name: We Escape Together
summary: While enjoying a peaceful evening, we suddenly find ourselves in an unknown place, forced to play a mysterious game. Should we play along with their rules? Can we truly reclaim our old lives—or are we trapped in this game forever?

name: WeedEx: Drug Express Delivery
summary: Start as a street dealer and rise to criminal power — produce and distribute various illegal substances across the dark streets of Hyland Point. Expand your empire by purchasing property, growing your business, acquiring new cars, and building a powerful underground network.

name: Welcome to Bodyland
summary: A theme park where every ride teaches something new about the human body. Take an adventure through the body! There's never been an amusement park quite like this before. Join Ricki, your tour guide, and her hilarious parrot companion, Hiccup, on an adventure through the Bodyland Theme Park. Fast-paced rides and challenging activities encourage kids to explore the park on their own and learn about the human body at the same time. For children aged 5-11 years.

name: We Are Gum
summary: A SUPER UPER DUPER VERY SIMPLE DEFINITELY EASY casual-friendly Sokoban puzzle. Please help send these Goofy Gums home... They're sticky and they really need your help...

name: Weed Garden Online
summary: Open up a Weed Shop franchise in the woods of Massachusetts and start growing weed in your outdoor garden. Sell your weed to locals, online customers, or the weed warehouse. Make money, upgrade, and customize your front shop or trick out your outdoor garden with unique rasta decorations.

name: Weed Shop
summary: Buying a run-down Medical Marijuana dispensary is easy, turning it into a weed empire is not! In order to become a local weed tycoon, you'll have to grow your own weed, upgrade your weed shop, deal with trippy stoners, stand up against local thugs, and more. Do you have what it takes to make it big in the weed farming business?

name: Weed Bakery
summary: Enter the high world of legalized recreational Marijuana in rocky Colorado! Cultivate the most popular and potent weed strains like the Chronic, White Widow, Purple Haze and turn them into the hottest Marijuana edibles in the state.

name: Weed Merge Inc
summary: Weed Merge Inc: The most addicting idle clicker weed game you'll ever play.

name: Welcome to the Game III
summary: Navigate the internet's dark net, searching for pieces of a puzzle that once combined will clear your outstanding debt. Scan strange websites for info, hack into PCs while defending your own, and buy/sell goods & services, all while avoiding threats in this strategic, suspenseful horror game.

name: We Only Come Out at Night
summary: A JRPG/Metroidvania hybrid that will have you traversing traps and puzzles with classic, turn-based combat. Learn new abilities to unlock new areas, and learn new spells to crush your enemies! Emotional, cute, and fun for all ages and all players, with a great soundtrack to boot!

name: We Gotta Go
summary:
We Gotta Go is a first person co-op horror game where you and your friends have to reach the only bathroom in a haunted mansion before your bowels betray you.

The mansion won’t make it easy: its many passages are blocked, locked, hidden, and haunted... can your team survive all the way to the porcelain promised land?

name: Well Tended
summary: A short storybook simulator about wandering through death's shade-filled garden, following the spiraling path of poisonous plants to the center.

name: Wee Boats
summary: A chill multiplayer boaty honk game!

name: Welehola
summary: Step into the shoes of a wizard student to learn the arcane arts in a magical academy! What sort of witching student life would you live?

name: Wetland
summary: Have I succumbed to madness, or am I the only one still sane in this chaos? Wetland is a narrative survival horror where you play as fisherwomen lost in a deceptive swamp. Manage your resources, endure haunting hallucinations, and discover if you are a victim… or an Impostor.

name: We Are The Wall
summary: We Are The Wall is a city-builder / RTS where you lead a hardy dwarf settlement fighting to protect their mountain home. Train armies, gather vital resources, explore the surrounding lands, and defend the Heart of the Mountain at all costs. We Are The Wall!

name: We Used to Play Here
summary: Daniel wakes up to the same nightmare every night. A girl he cannot escape. When he finds a missing child report tied to his childhood home, he returns to uncover a truth buried in twisted games and shattered memories.

name: Weaponeers
summary: Weaponeers is a multiplayer FPS, but instead of being supplied with a selection of weapons, you get to make your own completely from scratch. In Weaponeers, you battle against other players with both your skill and weapon-making wits, featuring a blend of both creativity and competitiveness.

name: Westlanders
summary: Forge your legacy in the Westlands. Survive and thrive in a Wild West open world. Alone or with friends, explore, fight, and build from your customizable wagon. Expand into bustling settlements, recruit allies, and forge a network to tame the wilderness and build your legacy.

name: We Want Your Head
summary: Hit… or die. Welcome to the twisted version of a classic arcade experience. In We Want Your Head, you enter a world of pixelated nightmares where disembodied heads burst out from the darkness. With every swing of your hammer, you fight for a few more seconds of peace — and for your own head.

name: Werehouse
summary: Werehouse is a co-op haunted night shift where you and up to 3 other overworked elves package presents for Santa. If stocking the sleigh trucks an hour before Christmas wasn’t stressful enough, you’ll be fighting for your life against holiday monsters while you’re at it.

name: Westland Survival: Albino Alligator
summary: On the frontier, no pet is mightier or harder to tame than an alligator. This snow-white albino is yours to claim, and its unique look will live on in its offspring, letting you build a bloodline of these fierce-looking beasts. Ride into town—no one’s gonna out-cool you now!

name: Westland Survival: Wind Spirit
summary: Ride like the legends of the frontier with the Wind Spirit DLC! This unique horse, painted in vibrant American Indigenous motifs, will pass its striking look to its offspring—carrying the spirit of the open plains for generations

name: Westland Survival: Uncle Gab’s Signet
summary: From the dusty trails to the wild frontier, Uncle Gabe’s Signet keeps you standing in the toughest fights. This unique one-of-a-kind ring shields you from poison, bleeding, and burning—turning the tide against both ruthless outlaws and wild beasts.

name: Weed Supermarket Simulator
summary: Grow weed and grow your business! Run your own weed supermarket, manage stock, set prices, and help customers. Try new strains, choose the best products, upgrade your shop, and keep your store running smoothly so people always come back.

name: Weapon Ball Fight
summary: A physics-based game about balls battling with other balls with weapons.

name: We Are Counting
summary:
We are counting.
I open my eyes.
Suction cups.
On my chest. On my arms. Everywhere.
Seventeen.
Eighteen.
Voices whisper.
Mom is waiting.
A short psychological horror visual novel about compulsive counting. A fragmented narrative where the ordinary melts into absurdity.

name: Webscape
summary: Webscape is a surreal narrative RPG set inside a deteriorating version of the 1990s internet. Trapped within the World Wide Web, you will make choices, form alliances, and fight your way toward escape through turn-based battles driven by playable micro-games.
